                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • *
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • admin-objects
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • *
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • config-properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • *
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • config-properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • *
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • security
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • security-domain
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • *
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • identity-trust
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • classic
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • authentication
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • classic
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • jaspi
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • login-module-stack
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • *
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • acl
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • classic
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • audit
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • classic
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • mapping
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • classic
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • jsse
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • classic
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • authorization
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • classic
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • vault
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • classic

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              root

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The root node of the server-level management model.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              namespaces

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Map of namespaces used in the configuration XML document, where keys are namespace prefixes and values are schema URIs.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:OBJECT of STRING values
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required: false
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              schema-locations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Map of locations of XML schemas used in the configuration XML document, where keys are schema URIs and values are locations where the schema can be found.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:OBJECT of STRING values
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required: false
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              name

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The name of this server. If not set, defaults to the runtime value of InetAddress.getLocalHost().getHostName().

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required: false
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              release-version

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The version of the JBoss Application Server release this server is running.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              release-codename

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The codename of the JBoss Application Server release this server is running.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              product-name

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The name of the JBoss AS based product that is being run by this server.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              product-version

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The version of the JBoss AS based product release that is being run by this server.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              management-major-version

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The major version of the JBoss AS management interface that is provided by this server.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              management-minor-version

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The minor version of the JBoss AS management interface that is provided by this server.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              management-micro-version

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The micro version of the JBoss AS management interface that is provided by this server.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              profile-name

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The name of the server's configuration profile.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • head-comment-allowed : true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • tail-comment-allowed : true

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              server-state

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The current state of the server controller; either STARTING, RUNNING or RESTART_REQUIRED

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              process-type

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The type of process represented by this root resource. Always has a value of "Server" for a server resource.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              launch-type

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The manner in which the server process was launched. Either "DOMAIN" for a domain mode server launched by a Host Controller, "STANDALONE" for a standalone server launched from the command line, or "EMBEDDED" for a standalone server launched as an embedded part of an application running in the same virtual machine.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • allowed: DOMAIN, STANDALONE, EMBEDDED

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove-namespace

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Removes a namespace prefix mapping from the namespaces attribute's map.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • namespace: The prefix of the namespace to remove.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              read-operation-description

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Gets the details of an operation on the given resource

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • name: The description of the operation. Undefined if not found
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • locale: The locale to get the operation description in. If null, the default locale will be used
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns The description of the operation. Undefined if not found

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type: OBJECT

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              resolve-expression

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operation that accepts an expression as input (or a string that can be parsed into an expression) and resolves it against the local system properties and environment variables.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • expression: The expression to resolve.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns The resolved expression, or the string form of the original input value if it did not represent an expression.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type: STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              read-resource

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Reads a model resource's attribute values along with either basic or complete information about any child resources

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • recursive: Whether to include complete information about child resources, recursively. If absent, false is the default
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • recursive-depth: The depth to which information about child resources should be included.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • proxies: Whether to include remote resources in a recursive query (i.e. host level resources in a query of the domain root; running server resources in a query of a host). If absent, false is the default.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • include-runtime: Whether to include runtime attributes (i.e. those whose value does not come from the persistent configuration) in the response. If absent, false is the default.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • include-defaults: Boolean to enable/disable default reading. In case it is set to false only attribute set by user are returned ignoring undefined.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • attributes-only: Whether or not to only read the attributes on the specified resource. Cannot be used in conjunction with 'recursive' or 'recursive-depth'.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • include-aliases: If 'true' and recursive, include children which are aliases.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns The resource's attribute values along with information about any child resources

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type: OBJECT

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove-schema-location

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Removes a schema location mapping from the schema-locations attribute's map.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • uri: The URI of the schema location to remove.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              validate-address

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Checks whether a resource with the address passed in as the argument exists.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • value: The address to check.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • OBJECT

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns Report of checking the address.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type: OBJECT

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              read-attribute

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Gets the value of an attribute for the selected resource

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • name: The name of the attribute to get the value for under the selected resource
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • include-defaults: Boolean to enable/disable default reading. In case it is set to false only attribute set by user are returned ignoring undefined.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns The value of the attribute. The type will be that of the attribute found

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type: OBJECT

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              full-replace-deployment

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Add previously uploaded deployment content to the list of content available for use, replace existing content of the same name in the runtime, and remove the replaced content from the list of content available for use. This is equivalent to an 'add', 'undeploy', 'deploy', 'remove' sequence where the new content has the same name as the content being replaced. Precisely one of 'runtime-name', 'hash', 'input-stream-index', 'bytes' or 'url' must be specified.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • name: Unique identifier of the deployment. Must be unique across all deployments.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • runtime-name: Name by which the deployment should be known within a server's runtime. This would be equivalent to the file name of a deployment file, and would form the basis for such things as default Java Enterprise Edition application and module names. This would typically be the same as 'name', but in some cases users may wish to have two deployments with the same 'runtime-name' (e.g. two versions of "foo.war") both available in the deployment content repository, in which case the deployments would need to have distinct 'name' values but would have the same 'runtime-name'.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • content: List of pieces of content that comprise the deployment.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • LIST

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              shutdown

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Shuts down the server via a call to System.exit(0)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • restart: If true, once shutdown the server will be restarted again
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              read-children-names

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Gets the names of all children under the selected resource with the given type

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • child-type: The name of the node under which to get the children names
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns The children names

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type: LIST

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              upload-deployment-stream

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Indicates that the deployment content available at the included input stream index should be added to the deployment content repository. Note that this operation does not indicate the content should be deployed into the runtime.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • input-stream-index: The index into the operation's attached input streams of the input stream that contains deployment content that should be uploaded to the domain's or standalone server's deployment content repository.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns The hash of managed deployment content that has been uploaded to the domain's or standalone server's deployment content repository.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type: BYTES

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              read-resource-description

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Gets the description of a resource's attributes, types of children and, optionally, operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • operations: Whether to include descriptions of the resource's operations. Default is false
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • inherited: If 'operations' is true, whether to include descriptions of the resource's inherited operations. Default is true.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • recursive: Whether to include recursively descriptions of child resources. Default is false.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • proxies: Whether to include remote resources in a recursive query (i.e. host level resources in a query of the domain root; running server resources in a query of a host). If absent, false is the default
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • recursive-depth: The depth to which information about child resources should be included.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • locale: The locale to get the resource description in. If null, the default locale will be used
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
