                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              username-attribute

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The name of the attribute to search for the user. This filter will then perform a simple search where the username entered by the user matches the attribute specified here.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Removes a configuration to use LDAP as the user repository.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Adds a configuration to use LDAP as the user repository.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • connection: The name of the connection to use to connect to LDAP.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • advanced-filter: The fully defined filter to be used to search for the user based on their entered user ID. The filter should contain a variable in the form {0} - this will be replaced with the username supplied by the user.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • base-dn: The base distinguished name to commence the search for the user.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • user-dn: The name of the attribute which is the user's distinguished name.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • recursive: Whether the search should be recursive.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • username-attribute: The name of the attribute to search for the user. This filter will then perform a simple search where the username entered by the user matches the attribute specified here.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              truststore

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Configuration of a keystore to use to create a trust manager to verify clients.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              keystore-password

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The password to open the keystore.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              keystore-path

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The path of the keystore.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              keystore-relative-to

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The name of another previously named path, or of one of the standard paths provided by the system. If 'relative-to' is provided, the value of the 'path' attribute is treated as relative to the path specified by this attribute.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Removes a keystore to use to create a trust manager to verify clients.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Adds a keystore to use to create a trust manager to verify clients.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • keystore-password: The password to open the keystore.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • keystore-path: The path of the keystore.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • keystore-relative-to: The name of another previously named path, or of one of the standard paths provided by the system. If 'relative-to' is provided, the value of the 'path' attribute is treated as relative to the path specified by this attribute.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Configuration to use a list users stored within a properties file as the user repository. The entries within the properties file are username={credentials} with each user being specified on it's own line.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              path

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The path of the properties file containing the users.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              plain-text

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Are the credentials within the properties file stored in plain text. If not the credential is expected to be the hex encoded Digest hash of 'username : realm : password'.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              relative-to

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The name of another previously named path, or of one of the standard paths provided by the system. If 'relative-to' is provided, the value of the 'path' attribute is treated as relative to the path specified by this attribute.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Removes a configuration to use a list users stored within a properties file as the user repository.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Adds a configuration to use a list users stored within a properties file as the user repository.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • path: The path of the properties file containing the users.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • plain-text: Are the credentials within the properties file stored in plain text. If not the credential is expected to be the hex encoded Digest hash of 'username : realm : password'.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • relative-to: The name of another previously named path, or of one of the standard paths provided by the system. If 'relative-to' is provided, the value of the 'path' attribute is treated as relative to the path specified by this attribute.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              users

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Configuration to use a list users stored directly within the standalone.xml or host.xml configuration file as the user repository.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Removes a configuration to use a list users stored directly within the standalone.xml or host.xml configuration file as the user repository.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Adds a configuration to use a list users stored directly within the standalone.xml or host.xml configuration file as the user repository.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              user

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              An authorized user.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              *

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              An authorized user.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              password

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The user's password.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Removes an authorized user.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Adds an authorized user.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              server-identity

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Configuration of the identities that represent the server.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              ssl

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Configuration of the SSL identity of a server or host controller.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              protocol

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The protocol to use when creating the SSLContext.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              keystore-relative-to

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The name of another previously named path, or of one of the standard paths provided by the system. If 'relative-to' is provided, the value of the 'path' attribute is treated as relative to the path specified by this attribute.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              alias

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The alias of the entry to use from the keystore.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              key-password

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The password to obtain the key from the keystore.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              keystore-password

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The password to open the keystore.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              keystore-path

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The path of the keystore.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Removes the SSL identity of a server or host controller.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • protocol: The protocol to use when creating the SSLContext.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • keystore-relative-to: The name of another previously named path, or of one of the standard paths provided by the system. If 'relative-to' is provided, the value of the 'path' attribute is treated as relative to the path specified by this attribute.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • alias: The alias of the entry to use from the keystore.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • key-password: The password to obtain the key from the keystore.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • keystore-password: The password to open the keystore.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • keystore-path: The path of the keystore.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns
