                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              non-durable-message-count

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The number of messages for all non-durable subscribers for this topic.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              subscription-count

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The number of (durable and non-durable) subscribers for this topic.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              durable-subscription-count

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The number of durable subscribers for this topic.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              non-durable-subscription-count

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The number of non-durable subscribers for this topic.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              list-non-durable-subscriptions-as-json

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              List only the non-durable subscriptions, as a string in JSON format.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type: STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              list-all-subscriptions-as-json

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              List all subscriptions as a string in JSON format.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type: STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              list-durable-subscriptions-as-json

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              List only the durable subscriptions, as a string in JSON format.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type: STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              list-non-durable-subscriptions

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              List only the non-durable subscriptions.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns A list, each of whose elements describes a single subscription.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type: LIST

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              drop-durable-subscription

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Drop a durable subscription

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • client-id: The client ID.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • subscription-name: The name of the durable subscription.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              drop-all-subscriptions

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Drop all subscriptions from this topic.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              list-messages-for-subscription-as-json

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              List all the messages for the given subscription as a string in JSON format.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • queue-name: The name of the queue representing a subscription
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns jms-topic.list-messages-for-subscription-as-json.reply

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type: STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              list-messages-for-subscription

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              List all the messages for the given subscription.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • queue-name: The name of the queue representing a subscription
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns A list where each element is a map of message properties to their value.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type: LIST

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              count-messages-for-subscription

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Count the number of messages matching the filter for the given subscription.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • client-id: The client ID.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • subscription-name: The name of the durable subscription.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • filter: A JMS message filter.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type: INT

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              list-all-subscriptions

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              List all subscriptions.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns A list, each of whose elements describes a single subscription.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type: LIST

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove-messages

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Remove messages matching the given filter from the destination.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • filter: A queue message filter definition. An undefined or empty filter will match all messages.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns The number of removed messages.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type: INT

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              list-durable-subscriptions

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              List only the durable subscriptions.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns A list, each of whose elements describes a single subscription.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type: LIST

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              path

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              webservices

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Runtime resources exposed by web service components in the deployment.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              endpoint

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Webservice endpoint.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              *

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Webservice endpoint.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              name

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Webservice endpoint name.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              context

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Webservice endpoint context.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              class

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Webservice endpoint class.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              type

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Webservice endpoint type.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              wsdl-url

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Webservice endpoint WSDL URL.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              average-processing-time

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Average endpoint processing time.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required: false
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              min-processing-time

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Minimal endpoint processing time.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required: false
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              max-processing-time

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Maximal endpoint processing time.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required: false
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              total-processing-time

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Total endpoint processing time.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required: false
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              request-count

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Count of requests the endpoint processed.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required: false
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              response-count

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Count of responses the endpoint generated.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required: false
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              fault-count

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Count of faults the endpoint generated.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required: false
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              jpa

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The configuration of the JPA subsystem.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              default-datasource

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The name of the default global datasource.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 0

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Remove the JPA subsystem.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Add the JPA subsystem.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • default-datasource: The name of the default global datasource.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              hibernate-persistence-unit

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Persistence unit

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              *

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Runtime information about Hibernate use in the deployment.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              entity-delete-count

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Get number of entity deletes.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              entity-insert-count

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Get number of entity inserts.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              entity-load-count

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Get number of entity loads.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              entity-fetch-count

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Get number of entity fetches.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              entity-update-count

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Get number of entity updates.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              query-execution-count

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Get number of executed queries.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime
