                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              optimistic-failure-count

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Number of optimistic lock exceptions.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              entity-fetch-count

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Get number of entity fetches.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              entity-insert-count

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Get number of entity inserts.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              entity-delete-count

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Get number of entity deletes.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              collection

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Statistics for individual collections.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              *

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Statistics for individual collections.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              collection-fetch-count

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Number of times collection was fetched.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              collection-recreated-count

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Number of times collection was recreated.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              collection-load-count

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Number of times collection was loaded.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              collection-update-count

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Number of times collection was updated.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              collection-remove-count

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Number of times collection was removed.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              ejb3

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Runtime resources exposed by EJBs components included in this deployment.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              message-driven-bean

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Message driven bean component included in the deployment.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              *

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Message driven bean component included in the deployment.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              timers

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              EJB timers associated with the component.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LIST of values
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              pool-available-count

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The number of available (i.e. not in use) instances in the pool.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              peak-concurrent-invocations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Peak concurrent invocations.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              invocations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Number of invocations processed.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              pool-create-count

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The number of bean instances that have been created.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              declared-roles

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The roles declared (via @DeclareRoles) on this EJB component.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LIST of STRING values
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              security-domain

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The security domain for this EJB component.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              pool-name

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The name of the pool.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              run-as-role

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The run-as role (if any) for this EJB component.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              component-class-name

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The component's class name.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              pool-max-size

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The maximum size of the pool.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              wait-time

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Time spend waiting to obtain an instance.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              execution-time

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Time spend within a bean method.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              pool-remove-count

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The number of bean instances that have been removed.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Singleton bean component included in the deployment.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LIST of STRING values

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The roles declared (via @DeclareRoles) on this EJB component.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LIST of STRING values
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              run-as-role

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The run-as role (if any) for this EJB component.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              component-class-name

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The component's class name.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              invocations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Number of invocations processed.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              wait-time

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Time spend waiting to obtain an instance.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              execution-time

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Time spend within a bean method.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              subsystem

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The subsystems that make up the server's profile.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              jaxrs

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The configuration of the JAX-RS subsystem.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operation removing the JAX-RS subsystem.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operation creating the JAX-RS subsystem.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              jacorb

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The JacORB subsystem configuration.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              transactions

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Indicates whether the transactions interceptors are to be installed (on or spec) or not (off). The value 'on' enabled JTS while 'spec' enables a spec compliant mode (non JTS) that rejects incoming transaction contexts.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • allowed: on, off, spec

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              support-ssl

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Indicates whether SSL is to be supported (on) or not (off).

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • allowed: on, off

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              socket-binding

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The name of the socket binding configuration that specifies the ORB port.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              pool-size

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The size of the request processors thread-pool. Threads that finish processing a request are placed back in the pool if the pool is not full and discarded otherwise.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              cache-poa-names

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Indicates whether POA names should be cached (on) or not (off).
