                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The largest number of threads that have ever simultaneously been in the pool.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              keepalive-time

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Used to specify the amount of time that pool threads should be kept running when idle; if not specified, threads will run until the executor is shut down.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:OBJECT of values
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              thread-factory

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Specifies the name of a specific thread factory to use to create worker threads. If not defined an appropriate default thread factory will be used.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              queue-length

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The queue length.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              handoff-executor

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              An executor to delegate tasks to in the event that a task cannot be accepted. If not specified, tasks that cannot be accepted will be silently discarded.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              max-threads

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The maximum thread pool size.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              name

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The name of the thread pool.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              rejected-count

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The number of tasks that have been passed to the handoff-executor (if one is specified) or discarded.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              allow-core-timeout

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Whether core threads may time out.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Removes a bounded queue thread pool.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Adds a bounded queue thread pool.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • core-threads: The core thread pool size which is smaller than the maximum pool size. If undefined, the core thread pool size is the same as the maximum thread pool size.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • keepalive-time: Used to specify the amount of time that pool threads should be kept running when idle; if not specified, threads will run until the executor is shut down.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • OBJECT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • thread-factory: Specifies the name of a specific thread factory to use to create worker threads. If not defined an appropriate default thread factory will be used.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • queue-length: The queue length.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • handoff-executor: An executor to delegate tasks to in the event that a task cannot be accepted. If not specified, tasks that cannot be accepted will be silently discarded.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • max-threads: The maximum thread pool size.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • name: The name of the thread pool.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • allow-core-timeout: Whether core threads may time out.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              queueless-thread-pool

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              A set of thread pools where are not queued and where if no pool thread is available to handle a task the tasks will either be discarded or passed off to another 'handoff-executor' for execution.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              *

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              A thread pool executor with no queue where threads submittings tasks will not block. When a task is submitted, if the number of running threads is less than the maximum size, a new thread is created. Otherwise, the task is handed off to the designated handoff executor, if one is specified. Otherwise, the task is discarded.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              thread-factory

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Specifies the name of a specific thread factory to use to create worker threads. If not defined an appropriate default thread factory will be used.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              handoff-executor

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              An executor to delegate tasks to in the event that a task cannot be accepted. If not specified, tasks that cannot be accepted will be silently discarded.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              max-threads

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The maximum thread pool size.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              name

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The name of the thread pool.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              current-thread-count

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The current number of threads in the pool.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              rejected-count

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The number of tasks that have been passed to the handoff-executor (if one is specified) or discarded.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              largest-thread-count

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The largest number of threads that have ever simultaneously been in the pool.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              keepalive-time

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Used to specify the amount of time that pool threads should be kept running when idle; if not specified, threads will run until the executor is shut down.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:OBJECT of values
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Removes a queueless thread pool.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Adds a queueless thread pool.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • thread-factory: Specifies the name of a specific thread factory to use to create worker threads. If not defined an appropriate default thread factory will be used.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • handoff-executor: An executor to delegate tasks to in the event that a task cannot be accepted. If not specified, tasks that cannot be accepted will be silently discarded.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • max-threads: The maximum thread pool size.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • name: The name of the thread pool.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • keepalive-time: Used to specify the amount of time that pool threads should be kept running when idle; if not specified, threads will run until the executor is shut down.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • OBJECT

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              unbounded-queue-thread-pool

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              A set of thread pools where tasks are stored in a queue with no maximum size.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              *

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              A thread pool executor with an unbounded queue. Such a thread pool has a core size and a queue with no upper bound. When a task is submitted, if the number of running threads is less than the core size, a new thread is created. Otherwise, the task is placed in queue. If too many tasks are allowed to be submitted to this type of executor, an out of memory condition may occur.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              active-count

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The approximate number of threads that are actively executing tasks.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              current-thread-count

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The current number of threads in the pool.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              task-count

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The approximate total number of tasks that have ever been scheduled for execution.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              largest-thread-count

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The largest number of threads that have ever simultaneously been in the pool.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              keepalive-time

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Used to specify the amount of time that pool threads should be kept running when idle; if not specified, threads will run until the executor is shut down.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:OBJECT of values
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              thread-factory

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Specifies the name of a specific thread factory to use to create worker threads. If not defined an appropriate default thread factory will be used.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              completed-task-count

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The approximate total number of tasks that have completed execution.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              max-threads

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The maximum thread pool size.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              name

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The name of the thread pool.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              rejected-count

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The number of tasks that have been rejected.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Removes an unbounded thread pool.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Adds an unbounded thread pool.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • keepalive-time: Used to specify the amount of time that pool threads should be kept running when idle; if not specified, threads will run until the executor is shut down.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • OBJECT
