                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • thread-factory: Specifies the name of a specific thread factory to use to create worker threads. If not defined an appropriate default thread factory will be used.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • max-threads: The maximum thread pool size.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • name: The name of the thread pool.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              thread-factory

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              A set of thread factories.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              *

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              A thread factory (implementing java.util.concurrent.ThreadFactory).

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              thread-name-pattern

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The template used to create names for threads. The following patterns may be used: %% - emit a percent sign %t - emit the per-factory thread sequence number %g - emit the global thread sequence number %f - emit the factory sequence number %i - emit the thread ID.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              group-name

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Specifies the name of a thread group to create for this thread factory.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              priority

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              May be used to specify the thread priority of created threads.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              name

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The name of the created thread factory.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Removes a thread factory

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Adds a thread factory

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • thread-name-pattern: The template used to create names for threads. The following patterns may be used: %% - emit a percent sign %t - emit the per-factory thread sequence number %g - emit the global thread sequence number %f - emit the factory sequence number %i - emit the thread ID.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • group-name: Specifies the name of a thread group to create for this thread factory.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • priority: May be used to specify the thread priority of created threads.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • name: The name of the created thread factory.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              blocking-bounded-queue-thread-pool

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              A set of thread pools where tasks are stored in a bounded-size queue and where threads submitting tasks will block until space is available in the queue.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              *

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              A thread pool executor with a bounded queue where threads submittings tasks may block. Such a thread pool has a core and maximum size and a specified queue length. When a task is submitted, if the number of running threads is less than the core size, a new thread is created. Otherwise, if there is room in the queue, the task is enqueued. Otherwise, if the number of running threads is less than the maximum size, a new thread is created. Otherwise, the caller blocks until room becomes available in the queue.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              core-threads

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The core thread pool size which is smaller than the maximum pool size. If undefined, the core thread pool size is the same as the maximum thread pool size.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              current-thread-count

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The current number of threads in the pool.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              largest-thread-count

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The largest number of threads that have ever simultaneously been in the pool.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              keepalive-time

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Used to specify the amount of time that pool threads should be kept running when idle; if not specified, threads will run until the executor is shut down.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:OBJECT of values
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              thread-factory

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Specifies the name of a specific thread factory to use to create worker threads. If not defined an appropriate default thread factory will be used.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              queue-length

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The queue length.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              max-threads

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The maximum thread pool size.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              name

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The name of the thread pool.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              rejected-count

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The number of tasks that have been passed to the handoff-executor (if one is specified) or discarded.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              allow-core-timeout

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Whether core threads may time out.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Removes a blocking bounded queue thread pool.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Adds a blocking bounded queue thread pool.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • core-threads: The core thread pool size which is smaller than the maximum pool size. If undefined, the core thread pool size is the same as the maximum thread pool size.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • keepalive-time: Used to specify the amount of time that pool threads should be kept running when idle; if not specified, threads will run until the executor is shut down.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • OBJECT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • thread-factory: Specifies the name of a specific thread factory to use to create worker threads. If not defined an appropriate default thread factory will be used.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • queue-length: The queue length.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • max-threads: The maximum thread pool size.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • name: The name of the thread pool.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • allow-core-timeout: Whether core threads may time out.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              blocking-queueless-thread-pool

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              A set of thread pools where are not queued and where threads submitting tasks will block until a pool thread is available to execute the task.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              *

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              A thread pool executor with no queue where threads submittings tasks may block. When a task is submitted, if the number of running threads is less than the maximum size, a new thread is created. Otherwise, the caller blocks until another thread completes its task and accepts the new one.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              thread-factory

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Specifies the name of a specific thread factory to use to create worker threads. If not defined an appropriate default thread factory will be used.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              current-thread-count

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The current number of threads in the pool.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              max-threads

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The maximum thread pool size.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              name

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The name of the thread pool.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              rejected-count

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The number of tasks that have been passed to the handoff-executor (if one is specified) or discarded.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              largest-thread-count

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The largest number of threads that have ever simultaneously been in the pool.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              keepalive-time

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Used to specify the amount of time that pool threads should be kept running when idle; if not specified, threads will run until the executor is shut down.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:OBJECT of values
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Removes a blocking queueless thread pool.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Adds a blocking queueless thread pool.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • thread-factory: Specifies the name of a specific thread factory to use to create worker threads. If not defined an appropriate default thread factory will be used.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • max-threads: The maximum thread pool size.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • name: The name of the thread pool.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • keepalive-time: Used to specify the amount of time that pool threads should be kept running when idle; if not specified, threads will run until the executor is shut down.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • OBJECT

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              scheduled-thread-pool

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              A set of scheduled thread pools.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              *

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              A scheduled thread pool executor.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              thread-factory

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Specifies the name of a specific thread factory to use to create worker threads. If not defined an appropriate default thread factory will be used.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              active-count

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The approximate number of threads that are actively executing tasks.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
