                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              completed-task-count

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The approximate total number of tasks that have completed execution.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              current-thread-count

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The current number of threads in the pool.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              max-threads

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The maximum thread pool size.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              name

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The name of the thread pool.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              task-count

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The approximate total number of tasks that have ever been scheduled for execution.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              largest-thread-count

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The largest number of threads that have ever simultaneously been in the pool.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              keepalive-time

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Used to specify the amount of time that pool threads should be kept running when idle; if not specified, threads will run until the executor is shut down.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:OBJECT of values
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Removes a queueless thread pool.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Adds a queueless thread pool.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • thread-factory: Specifies the name of a specific thread factory to use to create worker threads. If not defined an appropriate default thread factory will be used.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • max-threads: The maximum thread pool size.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • name: The name of the thread pool.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • keepalive-time: Used to specify the amount of time that pool threads should be kept running when idle; if not specified, threads will run until the executor is shut down.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • OBJECT

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              webservices

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The configuration of the web services subsystem.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              modify-wsdl-address

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Whether the soap address can be modified.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required: false
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              wsdl-host

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The WSDL, that is a required deployment artifact for an endpoint, has a element which points to the location of the endpoint. JBoss supports rewriting of that SOAP address. If the content of is a valid URL, JBossWS will not rewrite it unless 'modify-wsdl-address' is true. If the content of is not a valid URL, JBossWS will rewrite it using the attribute values given below. If 'wsdl-host' is set to 'jbossws.undefined.host', JBossWS uses requesters host when rewriting the

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required: false
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              wsdl-port

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The non-secure port that will be used for rewriting the SOAP address. If absent the port will be identified by querying the list of installed connectors.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required: false
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              wsdl-secure-port

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The secure port that will be used for rewriting the SOAP address. If absent the port will be identified by querying the list of installed connectors.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required: false
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Removes the web services subsystem.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Adds the web services subsystem.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • modify-wsdl-address: Whether the soap address can be modified.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • wsdl-host: The WSDL, that is a required deployment artifact for an endpoint, has a element which points to the location of the endpoint. JBoss supports rewriting of that SOAP address. If the content of is a valid URL, JBossWS will not rewrite it unless 'modify-wsdl-address' is true. If the content of is not a valid URL, JBossWS will rewrite it using the attribute values given below. If 'wsdl-host' is set to 'jbossws.undefined.host', JBossWS uses requesters host when rewriting the
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • wsdl-port: The non-secure port that will be used for rewriting the SOAP address. If absent the port will be identified by querying the list of installed connectors.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • wsdl-secure-port: The secure port that will be used for rewriting the SOAP address. If absent the port will be identified by querying the list of installed connectors.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              A Configuration Admin Service entry. The identity of the resource defines the Configuration Admin PID (Persistent Identifier) that entries are associated with.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              *

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              A Configuration Admin Service entry. The identity of the resource defines the Configuration Admin PID (Persistent Identifier) that entries are associated with.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              entries

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The list of configuration entries.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LIST of PROPERTY values
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              update

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Update a configuration entry.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • entries: The list of configuration entries.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • LIST

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Remove a configuration entry.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Add a configuration entry.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • entries: The list of configuration entries.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • LIST

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remoting

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The configuration of the Remoting subsystem.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              worker-read-threads

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The number of read threads to create for the remoting worker.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              worker-task-max-threads

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The maximum number of threads for the remoting worker task thread pool.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              worker-task-limit

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The maximum number of remoting worker tasks to allow before rejecting.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              worker-task-core-threads

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The number of core threads for the remoting worker task thread pool.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              worker-write-threads

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The number of write threads to create for the remoting worker.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              worker-task-keepalive

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The number of milliseconds to keep non-core remoting worker task threads alive.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Removes the Remoting subsystem.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Adds the Remoting subsystem.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • worker-read-threads: The number of read threads to create for the remoting worker.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • worker-task-max-threads: The maximum number of threads for the remoting worker task thread pool.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • worker-task-limit: The maximum number of remoting worker tasks to allow before rejecting.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • worker-task-core-threads: The number of core threads for the remoting worker task thread pool.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • worker-write-threads: The number of write threads to create for the remoting worker.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • worker-task-keepalive: The number of milliseconds to keep non-core remoting worker task threads alive.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              outbound-connection

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Remoting outbound connections.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              *

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Remoting outbound connection.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              uri

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The connection URI for the outbound connection.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Removes a generic URI based remoting outbound connection.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Adds a generic URI based remoting outbound connection.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • uri: The connection URI for the outbound connection.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              property

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The XNIO Options that will be used during the connection creation.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              *

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Properties supported by the underlying provider. The property name is inferred from the last element of the properties address.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              value

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The property value.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1
