                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • no-plain-text: The optional nested "no-plain-text" element contains a boolean value which specifies whether mechanisms susceptible to simple plain passive attacks (e.g., "PLAIN") are not permitted. "false" to permit, "true" to deny.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • no-active: The optional nested "no-active" element contains a boolean value which specifies whether mechanisms susceptible to active (non-dictionary) attacks are not permitted. "false" to permit, "true" to deny.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • pass-credentials: The optional nested "pass-credentials" element contains a boolean value which specifies whether mechanisms that pass client credentials are required.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • no-dictionary: The optional nested "no-dictionary" element contains a boolean value which specifies whether mechanisms susceptible to passive dictionary attacks are permitted. "false" to permit, "true" to deny.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • no-anonymous: The optional nested "no-anonymous" element contains a boolean value which specifies whether mechanisms that accept anonymous login are permitted. "false" to permit, "true" to deny.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              property

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Properties to further configure sasl.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              *

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Properties supported by the underlying provider. The property name is inferred from the last element of the properties address.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              value

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The property value.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Removes a property.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Adds a property.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • value: The property value.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              property

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Properties to further configure the connector.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              *

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Properties supported by the underlying provider. The property name is inferred from the last element of the properties address.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              value

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The property value.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Removes a property.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Adds a property.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • value: The property value.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              local-outbound-connection

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Remoting outbound connections for local:// URI scheme.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              *

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Remoting outbound connection with a implicit local:// URI scheme.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              outbound-socket-binding-ref

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Name of the outbound-socket-binding which will be used to determine the destination address and port for the connection.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Removes a local:// URI scheme based outbound connection.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Adds a local:// URI scheme based outbound connection.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • outbound-socket-binding-ref: Name of the outbound-socket-binding which will be used to determine the destination address and port for the connection.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              property

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The XNIO Options that will be used during the connection creation.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              *

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Properties supported by the underlying provider. The property name is inferred from the last element of the properties address.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              value

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The property value.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Removes a property.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Adds a property.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • value: The property value.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              infinispan

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The configuration of the infinispan subsystem

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Remove the infinispan subsystem

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Add the infinispan subsystem

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              cache-container

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The configuration of an infinispan cache container

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              *

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The configuration of an infinispan cache container

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              default-cache

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The default infinispan cache

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              aliases

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The list of aliases for this cache container

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LIST of values
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              jndi-name

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The jndi name to which to bind this cache container

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              start

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The cache container start mode, which can be EAGER (immediate start) or LAZY (on-demand start).

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • allowed: EAGER, LAZY

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              listener-executor

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The executor used for the replication queue

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              eviction-executor

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The scheduled executor used for eviction

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              replication-queue-executor

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The executor used for asynchronous cache operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              module

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The module whose class loader should be used when building this cache container's configuration.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove-alias

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Remove an alias for this cache container

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • name: Name of alias to add or remove
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Remove a cache container from the infinispan subsystem

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add-alias

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Add an alias for this cache container

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • name: Name of alias to add or remove
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Add a cache container to the infinispan subsystem

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • default-cache: The default infinispan cache
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • aliases: The list of aliases for this cache container
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • LIST
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • jndi-name: The jndi name to which to bind this cache container
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • start: The cache container start mode, which can be EAGER (immediate start) or LAZY (on-demand start).
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • listener-executor: The executor used for the replication queue
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • eviction-executor: The scheduled executor used for eviction
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • replication-queue-executor: The executor used for asynchronous cache operations
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • module: The module whose class loader should be used when building this cache container's configuration.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              transport

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The description of the transport used by this cache container

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              TRANSPORT

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The description of the transport used by this cache container

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              stack

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The jgroups stack to use for the transport

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              cluster

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The name of the group communication cluster

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
