                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              executor

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The executor to use for the transport

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              lock-timeout

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The timeout for locks for the transport

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Remove the transport from the cache container

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Add the transport to the cache container

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • stack: The jgroups stack to use for the transport
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • cluster: The name of the group communication cluster
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • executor: The executor to use for the transport
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • lock-timeout: The timeout for locks for the transport
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • LONG

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              local-cache

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              A local cache

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              *

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              A local cache

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              start

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The cache start mode, which can be EAGER (immediate start) or LAZY (on-demand start).

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • allowed: EAGER, LAZY

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              batching

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              If enabled, the invocation batching API will be made available for this cache.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              indexing

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              If enabled, entries will be indexed when they are added to the cache. Indexes will be updated as entries change or are removed.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • allowed: NONE, LOCAL, ALL

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              jndi-name

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The jndi-name to which to bind this cache instance.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              module

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The module whose class loader should be used when building this cache's configuration.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              indexing-properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Properties to control indexing behaviour

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:OBJECT of STRING values
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Remove a cache from this container.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Add a local cache to this cache container

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • start: The cache start mode, which can be EAGER (immediate start) or LAZY (on-demand start).
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • batching: If enabled, the invocation batching API will be made available for this cache.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • indexing: If enabled, entries will be indexed when they are added to the cache. Indexes will be updated as entries change or are removed.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • jndi-name: The jndi-name to which to bind this cache instance.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • module: The module whose class loader should be used when building this cache's configuration.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • indexing-properties: Properties to control indexing behaviour
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • OBJECT

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              locking

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The locking configuration of the cache.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              LOCKING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The locking configuration of the cache.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              isolation

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Sets the cache locking isolation level.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • allowed: NONE, SERIALIZABLE, REPEATABLE_READ, READ_COMMITTED, READ_UNCOMMITTED

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              striping

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              If true, a pool of shared locks is maintained for all entries that need to be locked. Otherwise, a lock is created per entry in the cache. Lock striping helps control memory footprint but may reduce concurrency in the system.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              acquire-timeout

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Maximum time to attempt a particular lock acquisition.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              concurrency-level

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Concurrency level for lock containers. Adjust this value according to the number of concurrent threads interacting with Infinispan.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Removes a locking configuration element from the cache.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Adds a locking configuration element to the cache.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • isolation: Sets the cache locking isolation level.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • striping: If true, a pool of shared locks is maintained for all entries that need to be locked. Otherwise, a lock is created per entry in the cache. Lock striping helps control memory footprint but may reduce concurrency in the system.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • acquire-timeout: Maximum time to attempt a particular lock acquisition.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • concurrency-level: Concurrency level for lock containers. Adjust this value according to the number of concurrent threads interacting with Infinispan.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              transaction

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The cache transaction configuration.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              TRANSACTION

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The cache transaction configuration.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              mode

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Sets the cache transaction mode to one of NONE, NON_XA, NON_DURABLE_XA, FULL_XA.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • allowed: NONE, NON_XA, NON_DURABLE_XA, FULL_XA

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              stop-timeout

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              If there are any ongoing transactions when a cache is stopped, Infinispan waits for ongoing remote and local transactions to finish. The amount of time to wait for is defined by the cache stop timeout.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              locking

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The locking mode for this cache, one of OPTIMISTIC or PESSIMISTIC.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • allowed: OPTIMISTIC, PESSIMISTIC

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Removes a transaction configuration element from the cache.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Adds a transaction configuration element to the cache.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • mode: Sets the cache transaction mode to one of NONE, NON_XA, NON_DURABLE_XA, FULL_XA.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • stop-timeout: If there are any ongoing transactions when a cache is stopped, Infinispan waits for ongoing remote and local transactions to finish. The amount of time to wait for is defined by the cache stop timeout.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • locking: The locking mode for this cache, one of OPTIMISTIC or PESSIMISTIC.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              eviction

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The cache eviction configuration.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              EVICTION

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The cache eviction configuration.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              strategy

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Sets the cache eviction strategy. Available options are 'UNORDERED', 'FIFO', 'LRU', 'LIRS' and 'NONE' (to disable eviction).

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • allowed: NONE, UNORDERED, FIFO, LRU, LIRS

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              max-entries

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Maximum number of entries in a cache instance. If selected value is not a power of two the actual value will default to the least power of two larger than selected value. -1 means no limit.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Removes an eviction configuration element from the cache.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Adds an eviction configuration element to the cache.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • strategy: Sets the cache eviction strategy. Available options are 'UNORDERED', 'FIFO', 'LRU', 'LIRS' and 'NONE' (to disable eviction).
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • max-entries: Maximum number of entries in a cache instance. If selected value is not a power of two the actual value will default to the least power of two larger than selected value. -1 means no limit.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              expiration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The cache expiration configuration.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              EXPIRATION

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The cache expiration configuration.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              max-idle

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Maximum idle time a cache entry will be maintained in the cache, in milliseconds. If the idle time is exceeded, the entry will be expired cluster-wide. -1 means the entries never expire.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
