                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • singleton: If true, the singleton store cache store is enabled. SingletonStore is a delegating cache store used for situations when only one instance in a cluster should interact with the underlying store.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • properties: A list of cache store properties.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • LIST
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • cache: The name of the remote cache to use for this remote store.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • tcp-no-delay: A TCP_NODELAY value for remote cache communication.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • socket-timeout: A socket timeout for remote cache communication.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • remote-servers: A list of remote servers for this cache store.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • LIST

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              write-behind

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Configures a cache store as write-behind instead of write-through.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              WRITE_BEHIND

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Configures a cache store as write-behind instead of write-through.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              flush-lock-timeout

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Timeout to acquire the lock which guards the state to be flushed to the cache store periodically.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              modification-queue-size

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Maximum number of entries in the asynchronous queue. When the queue is full, the store becomes write-through until it can accept new entries.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              thread-pool-size

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Size of the thread pool whose threads are responsible for applying the modifications to the cache store.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              shutdown-timeout

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Timeout in milliseconds to stop the cache store.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Removes a write-behind configuration element from the store.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Adds a write-behind configuration element to the store.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • flush-lock-timeout: Timeout to acquire the lock which guards the state to be flushed to the cache store periodically.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • modification-queue-size: Maximum number of entries in the asynchronous queue. When the queue is full, the store becomes write-through until it can accept new entries.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • thread-pool-size: Size of the thread pool whose threads are responsible for applying the modifications to the cache store.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • shutdown-timeout: Timeout in milliseconds to stop the cache store.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • LONG

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              property

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              A cache store property with name and value.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              *

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              A cache store property with name and value.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              value

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The value of the cache store property.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Removes a cache store property.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Adds a cache store property.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • value: The value of the cache store property.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              invalidation-cache

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              An invalidation cache

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              *

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              An invalidation cache

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              start

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The cache start mode, which can be EAGER (immediate start) or LAZY (on-demand start).

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • allowed: EAGER, LAZY

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              batching

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              If enabled, the invocation batching API will be made available for this cache.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              indexing

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              If enabled, entries will be indexed when they are added to the cache. Indexes will be updated as entries change or are removed.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • allowed: NONE, LOCAL, ALL

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              jndi-name

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The jndi-name to which to bind this cache instance.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              module

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The module whose class loader should be used when building this cache's configuration.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              indexing-properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Properties to control indexing behaviour

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:OBJECT of STRING values
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              async-marshalling

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              If enabled, this will cause marshalling of entries to be performed asynchronously.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              mode

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Sets the clustered cache mode, ASYNC for asynchronous operation, or SYNC for synchronous operation.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • allowed: SYNC, ASYNC

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              queue-size

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              In ASYNC mode, this attribute can be used to trigger flushing of the queue when it reaches a specific threshold.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              queue-flush-interval

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              In ASYNC mode, this attribute controls how often the asynchronous thread used to flush the replication queue runs. This should be a positive integer which represents thread wakeup time in milliseconds.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remote-timeout

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              In SYNC mode, the timeout (in ms) used to wait for an acknowledgment when making a remote call, after which the call is aborted and an exception is thrown.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Remove a cache from this container.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Add an invalidation cache to this cache container

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • start: The cache start mode, which can be EAGER (immediate start) or LAZY (on-demand start).
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • batching: If enabled, the invocation batching API will be made available for this cache.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • indexing: If enabled, entries will be indexed when they are added to the cache. Indexes will be updated as entries change or are removed.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • jndi-name: The jndi-name to which to bind this cache instance.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • module: The module whose class loader should be used when building this cache's configuration.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • indexing-properties: Properties to control indexing behaviour
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • OBJECT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • async-marshalling: If enabled, this will cause marshalling of entries to be performed asynchronously.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • mode: Sets the clustered cache mode, ASYNC for asynchronous operation, or SYNC for synchronous operation.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • queue-size: In ASYNC mode, this attribute can be used to trigger flushing of the queue when it reaches a specific threshold.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • queue-flush-interval: In ASYNC mode, this attribute controls how often the asynchronous thread used to flush the replication queue runs. This should be a positive integer which represents thread wakeup time in milliseconds.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • remote-timeout: In SYNC mode, the timeout (in ms) used to wait for an acknowledgment when making a remote call, after which the call is aborted and an exception is thrown.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • LONG

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              locking

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The locking configuration of the cache.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              LOCKING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The locking configuration of the cache.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              isolation

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Sets the cache locking isolation level.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • allowed: NONE, SERIALIZABLE, REPEATABLE_READ, READ_COMMITTED, READ_UNCOMMITTED

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              striping

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              If true, a pool of shared locks is maintained for all entries that need to be locked. Otherwise, a lock is created per entry in the cache. Lock striping helps control memory footprint but may reduce concurrency in the system.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              acquire-timeout

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Maximum time to attempt a particular lock acquisition.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              concurrency-level

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Concurrency level for lock containers. Adjust this value according to the number of concurrent threads interacting with Infinispan.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Removes a locking configuration element from the cache.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add
