                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              ejb3

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The configuration of the ejb3 subsystem.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              default-mdb-instance-pool

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Name of the default MDB instance pool, which will be applicable to all MDBs, unless overridden at the deployment or bean level

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              default-entity-bean-optimistic-locking

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              If set to true entity beans will use optimistic locking by default

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              in-vm-remote-interface-invocation-pass-by-value

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              If set to false, the parameters to invocations on remote interface of an EJB, will be passed by reference. Else, the parameters will be passed by value.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              default-clustered-sfsb-cache

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Name of the default stateful bean cache, which will be applicable to all clustered stateful EJBs, unless overridden at the deployment or bean level

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              default-entity-bean-instance-pool

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Name of the default entity bean instance pool, which will be applicable to all entity beans, unless overridden at the deployment or bean level

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              default-distinct-name

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The default distinct name that is applied to every EJB deployed on this server

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              default-singleton-bean-access-timeout

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The default access timeout for singleton beans

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              default-sfsb-cache

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Name of the default stateful bean cache, which will be applicable to all stateful EJBs, unless overridden at the deployment or bean level

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              default-resource-adapter-name

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Name of the default resource adapter name that will be used by MDBs, unless overridden at the deployment or bean level

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              enable-statistics

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              If set to true, enable the collection of invocation statistics.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              default-stateful-bean-access-timeout

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The default access timeout for stateful beans

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              default-slsb-instance-pool

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Name of the default stateless bean instance pool, which will be applicable to all stateless EJBs, unless overridden at the deployment or bean level

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Removes the ejb3 subsystem.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Adds the ejb3 subsystem.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • default-mdb-instance-pool: Name of the default MDB instance pool, which will be applicable to all MDBs, unless overridden at the deployment or bean level
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • default-entity-bean-optimistic-locking: If set to true entity beans will use optimistic locking by default
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • in-vm-remote-interface-invocation-pass-by-value: If set to false, the parameters to invocations on remote interface of an EJB, will be passed by reference. Else, the parameters will be passed by value.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • default-clustered-sfsb-cache: Name of the default stateful bean cache, which will be applicable to all clustered stateful EJBs, unless overridden at the deployment or bean level
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • default-entity-bean-instance-pool: Name of the default entity bean instance pool, which will be applicable to all entity beans, unless overridden at the deployment or bean level
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • default-distinct-name: The default distinct name that is applied to every EJB deployed on this server
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • default-singleton-bean-access-timeout: The default access timeout for singleton beans
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • default-sfsb-cache: Name of the default stateful bean cache, which will be applicable to all stateful EJBs, unless overridden at the deployment or bean level
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • default-resource-adapter-name: Name of the default resource adapter name that will be used by MDBs, unless overridden at the deployment or bean level
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • enable-statistics: If set to true, enable the collection of invocation statistics.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • default-stateful-bean-access-timeout: The default access timeout for stateful beans
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • default-slsb-instance-pool: Name of the default stateless bean instance pool, which will be applicable to all stateless EJBs, unless overridden at the deployment or bean level
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              service

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Centrally configurable services that are part of the EJB3 subsystem.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              async

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The EJB3 Asynchronous Invocation Service

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              thread-pool-name

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The name of the thread pool which handles asynchronous invocations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Removes the EJB3 Asynchronous Invocation Service

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Adds the EJB3 Asynchronous Invocation Service

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • thread-pool-name: The name of the thread pool which handles asynchronous invocations
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              iiop

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The IIOP service

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              enable-by-default

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              If this is true EJB's will be exposed over IIOP by default, otherwise it needs to be explicitly enabled in the deployment descriptor

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              use-qualified-name

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              If true EJB names will be bound into the naming service with the application and module name prepended to the name (e.g. myapp/mymodule/MyEjb)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Removes IIOP support

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Adds IIOP support to the EJB3 subsystem

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • enable-by-default: If this is true EJB's will be exposed over IIOP by default, otherwise it needs to be explicitly enabled in the deployment descriptor
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • use-qualified-name: If true EJB names will be bound into the naming service with the application and module name prepended to the name (e.g. myapp/mymodule/MyEjb)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remote

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The EJB3 Remote Service

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              thread-pool-name

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The name of the thread pool that handles remote invocations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              connector-ref

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The name of the connector on which the EJB3 remoting channel is registered

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Removes the EJB3 remote service

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Adds the EJB3 remote service

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • thread-pool-name: The name of the thread pool that handles remote invocations
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • connector-ref: The name of the connector on which the EJB3 remoting channel is registered
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              channel-creation-options

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The options that will be used during the EJB remote channel creation

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              *

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The options that will be used during the EJB remote channel creation

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              value

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The value for the EJB remote channel creation option

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              type

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The type of the channel creation option

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • allowed: remoting, xnio

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Removes a EJB remote channel creation option

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:
