                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              installed-drivers-list

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              List of JDBC drivers that have been installed in the runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns Defines the JDBC driver the datasource should use. It is a symbolic name matching the the name of installed driver. In case the driver is deployed as jar, the name is the name of deployment unit

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type: LIST

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Removes the data-sources subsystem

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              get-installed-driver

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Get a description of an installed driver

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • driver-name: The symbolic name of this driver used to reference it in the registry
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns Defines the JDBC driver the datasource should use. It is a symbolic name matching the the name of installed driver. In case the driver is deployed as jar, the name is the name of deployment unit

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type: OBJECT

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Adds the data-sources subsystem

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              jdbc-driver

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Service that make a JDBC driver available for use in the runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              *

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              A service that makes a JDBC driver available for use in the runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              driver-name

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The symbolic name of this driver used to reference it in the registry

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              deployment-name

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The name of the deployment unit from which the driver was loaded

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required: false
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              driver-module-name

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The name of the module from which the driver was loaded, if it was loaded from the module path

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required: false
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              module-slot

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The slot of the module from which the driver was loaded, if it was loaded from the module path

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required: false
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              driver-class-name

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The fully qualified class name of the java.sql.Driver implementation

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required: false
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              xa-datasource-class

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The fully qualified class name of the javax.sql.XADataSource implementation

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required: false
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              driver-major-version

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The driver's major version number

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required: false
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              driver-minor-version

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The driver's minor version number

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required: false
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              jdbc-compliant

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Whether or not the driver is JDBC compliant

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required: false
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Remove a JDBC driver

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Add a new JDBC driver

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • driver-name: The symbolic name of this driver used to reference it in the registry
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • deployment-name: The name of the deployment unit from which the driver was loaded
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • driver-module-name: The name of the module from which the driver was loaded, if it was loaded from the module path
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • module-slot: The slot of the module from which the driver was loaded, if it was loaded from the module path
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • driver-class-name: The fully qualified class name of the java.sql.Driver implementation
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • driver-xa-datasource-class-name: The fully qualified class name of the javax.sql.XADataSource implementation
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • driver-major-version: The driver's major version number
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • driver-minor-version: The driver's minor version number
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • jdbc-compliant: Whether or not the driver is JDBC compliant
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              data-source

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              A JDBC data-source configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              ExampleDS

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              A JDBC data-source configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              connection-url

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The JDBC driver connection URL

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              driver-class

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The fully qualified name of the JDBC driver class

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              datasource-class

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The fully qualified name of the JDBC datasource class

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              jndi-name

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Specifies the JNDI name for the datasource

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              driver-name

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Defines the JDBC driver the datasource should use. It is a symbolic name matching the the name of installed driver. In case the driver is deployed as jar, the name is the name of deployment unit

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              new-connection-sql

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Specifies an SQL statement to execute whenever a connection is added to the connection pool

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              url-delimiter

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Specifies the delimiter for URLs in connection-url for HA datasources

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              url-selector-strategy-class-name

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              A class that implements org.jboss.jca.adapters.jdbc.URLSelectorStrategy

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              use-java-context

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Setting this to false will bind the datasource into global JNDI

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              jta

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Enable JTA integration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              max-pool-size

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The max-pool-size element specifies the maximum number of connections for a pool. No more connections will be created in each sub-pool

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              min-pool-size

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The min-pool-size element specifies the minimum number of connections for a pool

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              pool-prefill

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Should the pool be prefilled. Changing this value can be done only on disabled datasource, requires a server restart otherwise.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              pool-use-strict-min

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Specifies if the min-pool-size should be considered strictly

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              user-name

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Specify the user name used when creating a new connection

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              password

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Specifies the password used when creating a new connection

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              security-domain

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Specifies the security domain which defines the javax.security.auth.Subject that are used to distinguish connections in the pool

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              reauth-plugin-class-name

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The fully qualified class name of the reauthentication plugin implementation

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
