                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Defines a handler which writes to the console.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              encoding

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The character encoding used by this Handler.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              level

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The log level specifying which message levels will be logged by this. Message levels lower than this value will be discarded.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • allowed: ALL, FINEST, FINER, TRACE, DEBUG, FINE, CONFIG, INFO, WARN, WARNING, ERROR, FATAL, OFF

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              filter

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Defines a simple filter type.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:OBJECT of values
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • allowed: all, any, accept, change-level, deny, level, level-range, match, not, replace

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              formatter

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Defines a formatter.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              autoflush

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Automatically flush after each write.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              target

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Defines the target of the console handler. The value can either be SYSTEM_OUT or SYSTEM_ERR.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • allowed: System.out, System.err

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Remove an existing logging handler.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              update-properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Update the properties of an existing console handler.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • name: The handler's name.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • encoding: The character encoding used by this Handler.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • level: The log level specifying which message levels will be logged by this. Message levels lower than this value will be discarded.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • filter: Defines a simple filter type.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • OBJECT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • formatter: Defines a formatter.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • autoflush: Automatically flush after each write.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • target: Defines the target of the console handler. The value can either be SYSTEM_OUT or SYSTEM_ERR.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              enable

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Enable a logging handler.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              disable

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Disable a logging handler.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              change-log-level

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Change the logging level for a handler.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • level: The log level specifying which message levels will be logged by this logger. Message levels lower than this value will be discarded.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Defines a handler which writes to the console.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • name: The handler's name.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • encoding: The character encoding used by this Handler.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • level: The log level specifying which message levels will be logged by this. Message levels lower than this value will be discarded.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • filter: Defines a simple filter type.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • OBJECT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • formatter: Defines a formatter.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • autoflush: Automatically flush after each write.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • target: Defines the target of the console handler. The value can either be SYSTEM_OUT or SYSTEM_ERR.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              file-handler

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Defines a handler which writes to a file.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              *

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Defines a handler which writes to a file.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              encoding

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The character encoding used by this Handler.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              level

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The log level specifying which message levels will be logged by this. Message levels lower than this value will be discarded.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • allowed: ALL, FINEST, FINER, TRACE, DEBUG, FINE, CONFIG, INFO, WARN, WARNING, ERROR, FATAL, OFF

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              filter

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Defines a simple filter type.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:OBJECT of values
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • allowed: all, any, accept, change-level, deny, level, level-range, match, not, replace

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              formatter

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Defines a formatter.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              autoflush

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Automatically flush after each write.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              append

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Specify whether to append to the target file.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              file

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The file description consisting of the path and optional relative to path.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:OBJECT of values
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Remove an existing logging handler.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              update-properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Update the properties of an existing file handler.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • name: The handler's name.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • encoding: The character encoding used by this Handler.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • level: The log level specifying which message levels will be logged by this. Message levels lower than this value will be discarded.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • filter: Defines a simple filter type.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • OBJECT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • formatter: Defines a formatter.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • autoflush: Automatically flush after each write.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • append: Specify whether to append to the target file.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • file: The file description consisting of the path and optional relative to path.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • OBJECT

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              enable

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Enable a logging handler.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              change-file

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Change the file for a handler.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • OBJECT

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              disable

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Disable a logging handler.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              change-log-level

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Change the logging level for a handler.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • level: The log level specifying which message levels will be logged by this logger. Message levels lower than this value will be discarded.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Defines a handler which writes to a file.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • name: The handler's name.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • encoding: The character encoding used by this Handler.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • level: The log level specifying which message levels will be logged by this. Message levels lower than this value will be discarded.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • filter: Defines a simple filter type.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • OBJECT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • formatter: Defines a formatter.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • autoflush: Automatically flush after each write.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • append: Specify whether to append to the target file.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • file: The file description consisting of the path and optional relative to path.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • OBJECT

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              periodic-rotating-file-handler

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Defines a handler which writes to a file, rotating the log after a time period derived from the given suffix string, which should be in a format understood by java.text.SimpleDateFormat.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              *

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Defines a handler which writes to a file, rotating the log after a time period derived from the given suffix string, which should be in a format understood by java.text.SimpleDateFormat.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              encoding

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The character encoding used by this Handler.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              level

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The log level specifying which message levels will be logged by this. Message levels lower than this value will be discarded.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
