                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • encoding: The character encoding used by this Handler.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • level: The log level specifying which message levels will be logged by this. Message levels lower than this value will be discarded.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • filter: Defines a simple filter type.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • OBJECT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • formatter: Defines a formatter.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • autoflush: Automatically flush after each write.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • append: Specify whether to append to the target file.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • file: The file description consisting of the path and optional relative to path.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • OBJECT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • rotate-size: The size at which to rotate the log file.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • max-backup-index: The maximum number of backups to keep.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              custom-handler

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Defines a custom logging handler. The custom handler must extend java.util.logging.Handler.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              *

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Defines a custom logging handler. The custom handler must extend java.util.logging.Handler.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              encoding

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The character encoding used by this Handler.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              level

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The log level specifying which message levels will be logged by this. Message levels lower than this value will be discarded.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • allowed: ALL, FINEST, FINER, TRACE, DEBUG, FINE, CONFIG, INFO, WARN, WARNING, ERROR, FATAL, OFF

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              filter

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Defines a simple filter type.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:OBJECT of values
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • allowed: all, any, accept, change-level, deny, level, level-range, match, not, replace

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              formatter

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Defines a formatter.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              class

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The logging handler class to be used.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              module

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The module that the logging handler depends on.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Defines the properties used for the logging handler. All properties must be accessible via a setter method.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LIST of values
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Remove an existing logging handler.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              update-properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Update the properties of an existing custom logging handler.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • name: The handler's name.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • encoding: The character encoding used by this Handler.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • level: The log level specifying which message levels will be logged by this. Message levels lower than this value will be discarded.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • filter: Defines a simple filter type.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • OBJECT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • formatter: Defines a formatter.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • properties: Defines the properties used for the logging handler. All properties must be accessible via a setter method.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • LIST

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              enable

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Enable a logging handler.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              disable

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Disable a logging handler.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              change-log-level

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Change the logging level for a handler.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • level: The log level specifying which message levels will be logged by this logger. Message levels lower than this value will be discarded.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Defines a custom logging handler. The custom handler must extend java.util.logging.Handler.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • name: The handler's name.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • encoding: The character encoding used by this Handler.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • level: The log level specifying which message levels will be logged by this. Message levels lower than this value will be discarded.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • filter: Defines a simple filter type.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • OBJECT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • formatter: Defines a formatter.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • class: The logging handler class to be used.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • module: The module that the logging handler depends on.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • properties: Defines the properties used for the logging handler. All properties must be accessible via a setter method.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • LIST

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              jdr

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              JBoss Diagnostic Reporter (JDR) Subsystem.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Removes the JDR subsystem.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              generate-jdr-report

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request the generation of a JDR report.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns jdr.report.return

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type: OBJECT

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Adds the JDR subsystem.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              messaging

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The messaging subsystem.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operation removing the messaging subsystem

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operation adding the messaging subsystem

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              jms-bridge

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              A JMS bridge instance.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              *

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              A JMS bridge instance.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              selector

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              A JMS selector expression used for consuming messages from the source destination. Only messages that match the selector expression will be bridged from the source to the target destination.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              failure-retry-interval

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The amount of time in milliseconds to wait between trying to recreate connections to the source or target servers when the bridge has detected they have failed.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              source-destination

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The name of the source destination to lookup on the source messaging server.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              quality-of-service

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The desired quality of service mode (AT_MOST_ONCE, DUPLICATES_OK or ONCE_AND_ONLY_ONCE).

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • allowed: AT_MOST_ONCE, DUPLICATES_OK, ONCE_AND_ONLY_ONCE

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              target-password

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The password for creating the target connection.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              max-batch-size

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The maximum number of messages to consume from the source destination before sending them in a batch to the target destination. Its value must >= 1.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              max-retries

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The number of times to attempt to recreate connections to the source or target servers when the bridge has detected they have failed. The bridge will give up after trying this number of times. -1 represents 'try forever'.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              client-id

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The JMS client ID to use when creating/looking up the subscription if it is durable and the source destination is a topic.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              source-password

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The password for creating the source connection.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              target-connection-factory

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The name of the target connection factory to lookup on the target messaging server.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              target-destination

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The name of the target destination to lookup on the target messaging server.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1
