                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The number of messages added to this queue since it was created.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              durable-message-count

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The number of messages for all durable subscribers for this topic.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              non-durable-message-count

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The number of messages for all non-durable subscribers for this topic.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              subscription-count

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The number of (durable and non-durable) subscribers for this topic.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              durable-subscription-count

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The number of durable subscribers for this topic.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              non-durable-subscription-count

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The number of non-durable subscribers for this topic.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              list-durable-subscriptions-as-json

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              List only the durable subscriptions, as a string in JSON format.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type: STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Remove a JMS topic.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              list-non-durable-subscriptions

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              List only the non-durable subscriptions.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns A list, each of whose elements describes a single subscription.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type: LIST

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              drop-all-subscriptions

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Drop all subscriptions from this topic.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add-jndi

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Adds the queue to another JNDI binding

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • jndi-binding: The name of the binding for JNDI
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              list-messages-for-subscription

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              List all the messages for the given subscription.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • queue-name: The name of the queue representing a subscription
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns A list where each element is a map of message properties to their value.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type: LIST

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Add a JMS topic.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • entries: The jndi names the topic will be bound to.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • LIST

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove-messages

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Remove messages matching the given filter from the destination.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • filter: A queue message filter definition. An undefined or empty filter will match all messages.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns The number of removed messages.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type: INT

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              list-durable-subscriptions

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              List only the durable subscriptions.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns A list, each of whose elements describes a single subscription.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type: LIST

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              list-all-subscriptions-as-json

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              List all subscriptions as a string in JSON format.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type: STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              list-non-durable-subscriptions-as-json

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              List only the non-durable subscriptions, as a string in JSON format.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type: STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              drop-durable-subscription

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Drop a durable subscription

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • client-id: The client ID.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • subscription-name: The name of the durable subscription.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              list-messages-for-subscription-as-json

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              List all the messages for the given subscription as a string in JSON format.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • queue-name: The name of the queue representing a subscription
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns jms-topic.list-messages-for-subscription-as-json.reply

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type: STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              count-messages-for-subscription

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Count the number of messages matching the filter for the given subscription.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • client-id: The client ID.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • subscription-name: The name of the durable subscription.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • filter: A JMS message filter.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type: INT

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              list-all-subscriptions

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              List all subscriptions.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns A list, each of whose elements describes a single subscription.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type: LIST

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              in-vm-connector

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Used by an in-VM client to define how it connects to a server.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              *

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Used by an in-VM client to define how it connects to a server.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              server-id

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The server id.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operation removing a connector

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operation adding a connector

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • server-id: The server id.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • param: A set of key-value pairs understood by the connector factory-class and used to configure it.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • OBJECT

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              param

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              A key-value pair understood by the connector factory-class and used to configure it.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              *

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              A parameter

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              value

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The parameter value

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operation removing an existing parameter

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operation adding a new parameter

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • value: The parameter value
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              divert

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              A messaging resource that allows you to transparently divert messages routed to one address to some other address, without making any changes to any client application logic.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              *

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              A messaging resource that allows you to transparently divert messages routed to one address to some other address, without making any changes to any client application logic.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              divert-address

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Address to divert from

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              exclusive

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Whether the divert is exclusive, meaning that the message is diverted to the new address, and does not go to the old address at all.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              routing-name

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Routing name of the divert

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              forwarding-address

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Address to divert to

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              filter

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              An optional filter string. If specified then only messages which match the filter expression specified will be diverted. The filter string follows the HornetQ filter expression syntax described in the HornetQ documentation.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              transformer-class-name

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The name of a class used to transform the message's body or properties before it is diverted.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operation removing a divert

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operation adding a divert

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • divert-address: Address to divert from
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • exclusive: Whether the divert is exclusive, meaning that the message is diverted to the new address, and does not go to the old address at all.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • routing-name: Routing name of the divert
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • forwarding-address: Address to divert to
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • filter: An optional filter string. If specified then only messages which match the filter expression specified will be diverted. The filter string follows the HornetQ filter expression syntax described in the HornetQ documentation.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • transformer-class-name: The name of a class used to transform the message's body or properties before it is diverted.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:
