                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              topology

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The topology of the nodes that this cluster connection is aware of.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              started

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Whether the cluster connection is started.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              stop

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Stops the cluster connection.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              get-nodes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns a map of the nodes connected to this cluster connection, where keys are node IDs and values are the addresses used to connect to the nodes.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns A map where keys are node IDs and values are the addresses used to connect to the nodes.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type: OBJECT

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operation removing a cluster connection

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              start

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Starts the cluster connection.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              get-static-connectors-as-json

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns the list of static connectors as a string in JSON format.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type: STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operation adding a cluster connection

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • cluster-connection-address: Each cluster connection only applies to messages sent to an address that starts with this value.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • connector-ref: The confirmation-window-size to use for the connection used to forward messages to a target node.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-large-message-size: The minimum size (in bytes) for a message before it is considered as a large message.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • connection-ttl: The maximum time (in milliseconds) for which the connections used by the cluster connections are considered alive (in the absence of heartbeat).
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • retry-interval: The period in milliseconds between subsequent reconnection attempts, if the connection to the target server has failed.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • retry-interval-multiplier: A multiplier to apply to the time since the last retry to compute the time to the next retry. This allows you to implement an exponential backoff between retry attempts.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BIG_DECIMAL
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • max-retry-interval: The maximum interval of time used to retry connections
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • reconnect-attempts: The total number of reconnect attempts the bridge will make before giving up and shutting down. A value of -1 signifies an unlimited number of attempts.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • use-duplicate-detection: Whether the bridge will automatically insert a duplicate id property into each message that it forwards.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • check-period: The period (in milliseconds) between client failure check.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • call-timeout: The timeout (in ms) for remote calls made by the cluster connection.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • forward-when-no-consumers: Whether messages will be distributed round robin between other nodes of the cluster irrespective of whether there are matching or indeed any consumers on other nodes. If this is set to false (the default) then HornetQ will only forward messages to other nodes of the cluster if the address to which they are being forwarded has queues which have consumers, and if those consumers have message filters (selectors) at least one of those selectors must match the message.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • max-hops: The maximum number of times a message can be forwarded. HornetQ can be configured to also load balance messages to nodes which might be connected to it only indirectly with other HornetQ servers as intermediates in a chain.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • confirmation-window-size: The confirmation-window-size to use for the connection used to forward messages to a target node.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • static-connectors: The statically defined list of connectors to which this cluster connection will make connections. Must be undefined (null) if 'discovery-group-name' is defined.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • LIST
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • discovery-group-name: The discovery group used to obtain the list of other servers in the cluster to which this cluster connection will make connections. Must be undefined (null) if 'static-connectors' is defined.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • allow-direct-connections-only: Whether, if a node learns of the existence of a node that is more than 1 hop away, we do not create a bridge for direct cluster connection. Only relevant if 'static-connectors' is defined.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              connection-factory

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Defines a connection factory.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              *

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Defines a connection factory.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              connector

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Defines the connectors. These are stored in a map by connector name (with an undefined value).

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:OBJECT of STRING values
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              entries

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The jndi names the connection factory should be bound to.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LIST of STRING values
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              auto-group

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Whether or not message grouping is automatically used

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              block-on-acknowledge

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              True to set block on acknowledge.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              block-on-durable-send

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              True to set block on durable send.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              block-on-non-durable-send

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              True to set block on non durable send.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              cache-large-message-client

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              True to cache large messages.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              call-timeout

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The call time out.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              client-failure-check-period

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The client failure check period.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              client-id

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The client id.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              compress-large-messages

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Whether large messages should be compressed.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              confirmation-window-size

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The confirmation window size.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              connection-ttl

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The connection ttl.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              consumer-max-rate

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The consumer max rate.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              consumer-window-size

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The consumer window size.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              discovery-group-name

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The discovery group name.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              discovery-initial-wait-timeout

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The discovery initial wait time out.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              dups-ok-batch-size

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The dups ok batch size.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              failover-on-initial-connection

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              True to fail over on initial connection.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              failover-on-server-shutdown

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              True to fail over on server shutdown.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              group-id

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The group id.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              ha

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Whether the connection factory supports High Availability.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              connection-load-balancing-policy-class-name

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Name of a class implementing a client-side load balancing policy that a client can use to load balance sessions across different nodes in a cluster.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              max-retry-interval

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The max retry interval.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
