                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              rotate

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Rotate the access log every day.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              prefix

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Prefix for the log file name.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              extended

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Enable extended pattern, with more options.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              resolve-hosts

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Host resolution.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Remove access log configuration from this virtual server.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Add access log configuration to this virtual server.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • pattern: The access log pattern.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • rotate: Rotate the access log every day.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • prefix: Prefix for the log file name.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • extended: Enable extended pattern, with more options.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • resolve-hosts: Host resolution.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              directory

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The location for the access logging.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              setting

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Settings for access log

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              directory

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The location for the access logging.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              path

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The relative folder path.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              relative-to

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The folder the path is relative to.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Removes directory

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Adds directory

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • path: The relative folder path.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • relative-to: The folder the path is relative to.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              rewrite

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              A list of rewrite rules that will be processed in order on the URL or vhost specified in the request.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              *

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              A list of rewrite rules that will be processed in order on the URL or vhost specified in the request.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              substitution

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The string that will replace the original URL or vhost.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              flags

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Option flags for this rewrite rule.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              pattern

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The pattern that will be matched.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Remove a rule from the list of rewrite rules.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Add a rule to the list of rewrite rules.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • substitution: The string that will replace the original URL or vhost.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • flags: Option flags for this rewrite rule.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • pattern: The pattern that will be matched.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              condition

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              A list of conditions this rule needs to match for rewrite to occur.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              *

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              A list of conditions this rule needs to match for rewrite to occur.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              flags

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Option flags for this condition.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              pattern

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The pattern to match.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              test

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Test pattern for the condition.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Remove a condition from the list of conditions of the rule.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Add a condition to the list of conditions of the rule.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • flags: Option flags for this condition.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • pattern: The pattern to match.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • test: Test pattern for the condition.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              sso

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The SSO configuration for this virtual server.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              access-log

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The access log configuration for this virtual server.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              connector

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              A web connector.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              *

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              A web connector.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              bytesSent

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Number of byte sent by the connector.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              proxy-port

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The port that will be used when sending a redirect.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              secure

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Indicates if content sent or received by the connector is secured from the user perspective.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              virtual-server

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The list of virtual servers that can be accessed through this connector. The default is to allow all virtual servers.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LIST of values
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              errorCount

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Number of error that occurs when processing requests by the connector.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              maxTime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Max time spent to process a requests.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              socket-binding

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The web connector socket-binding reference, this connector should be bound to.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              scheme

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The web connector scheme.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              name

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              A unique name for the connector.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              max-post-size

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Maximum size in bytes of a POST request that can be parsed by the container.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              requestCount

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Number of the request processed by the connector.
