Otherwise the runtime pathname is resolved in a system-dependent way. On UNIX systems, a relative pathname is made absolute by resolving it against the current user directory. On Microsoft Windows systems, a relative pathname is made absolute by resolving it against the current directory of the drive named by the pathname, if any; if not, it is resolved against the current user directory.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • relative-to: The name of another previously named path, or of one of the standard paths provided by the system. If 'relative-to' is provided, the value of the 'path' attribute is treated as relative to the path specified by this attribute. The standard paths provided by the system include:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • jboss.home - the root directory of the JBoss AS distribution
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • user.home - user's home directory
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • user.dir - user's current working directory
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • java.home - java installation directory
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • jboss.server.base.dir - root directory for an individual server instance
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • jboss.server.data.dir - directory the server will use for persistent data file storage
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • jboss.server.log.dir - directory the server will use for log file storage
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • jboss.server.tmp.dir - directory the server will use for temporary file storage
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • jboss.domain.servers.dir - directory under which a host controller will create the working area for individual server instances
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              system-property

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              A list of system properties to set on the server.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              *

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              A system property to set on the server.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              value

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The value of the system property.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required: false
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Removes a system property.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Adds a system property or updates an existing one.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • value: The value of the system property.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              core-service

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Core services provided by the server.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              service-container

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The central container that manages all services in a running standalone server or in a host controller in a management domain.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              dump-services

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Dumps all services running in the container, including their status and dependency information.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type: STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              vault

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Security Vault for attributes.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              code

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Fully Qualified Name of the Security Vault Implementation.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              vault-options

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Security Vault options.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:OBJECT of STRING values
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Remove the Security Vault.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Add the Security Vault.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • code: Fully Qualified Name of the Security Vault Implementation.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • vault-options: Security Vault options.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • OBJECT

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              server-environment

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The server environment.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              config-file

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The configuration file used to launch JBoss Application Server.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              initial-running-mode

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The current running mode of the server. Either LIVE (normal operations) or ADMIN_ONLY. An ADMIN_ONLY server will start any configured management interfaces and accept management requests, but will not start services used for handling end user requests.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • allowed: NORMAL, ADMIN_ONLY

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              ext-dirs

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              A list of ext directories.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              content-dir

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The directory where user content (e.g. deployments) that is managed by the server is stored.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              log-dir

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The directory where log files are sent.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              temp-dir

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The temporary directory.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              data-dir

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The data directory.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              node-name

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The name of the server node.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              deploy-dir

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Deprecated variant of 'content-dir'.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              base-dir

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The base directory for JBoss Application Server.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              home-dir

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The home directory for JBoss Application Server.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              host-name

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The host name.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              launch-type

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The type of the running server.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              modules-dir

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The directory where modules are found.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              qualified-host-name

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The qualified host name.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              config-dir

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The directory where the configurations are stored.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              server-name

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The name of the server.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              platform-mbean

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Provides the management interface for monitoring and management of the Java virtual machine as well as the operating system on which the Java virtual machine is running. Exposes the JDK-provided JMX MBeans in the java.lang, java.nio and java.util.logging JMX domains.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              type

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The platform MBeans, organized by the value of the 'type' property in the MBean's ObjectName.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              compilation

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The management interface for the compilation system of the Java virtual machine

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              name

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The name of the Just-in-time (JIT) compiler.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              compilation-time-monitoring-supported

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Whether the Java virtual machine supports the monitoring of compilation time.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              total-compilation-time

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The approximate accumulated elapsed time (in milliseconds) spent in compilation. A Java virtual machine implementation may not support compilation time monitoring. If "compilation-time-monitoring-supported", is "false" trying to read this attribute via the "read-attribute" operation will result in failure, and the value of this attribute in the result of a "read-resource" operation will be "undefined".

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              object-name

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              String representation the object name of this platform managed object.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              read-resource

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Reads a model resource's attribute values along with either basic or complete information about any child resources

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • recursive: Whether to include complete information about child resources, recursively. If absent, false is the default
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • recursive-depth: The depth to which information about child resources should be included.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • proxies: Whether to include remote resources in a recursive query (i.e. host level resources in a query of the domain root; running server resources in a query of a host). If absent, false is the default.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • include-runtime: Whether to include runtime attributes (i.e. those whose value does not come from the persistent configuration) in the response. If absent, false is the default.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • include-defaults: Boolean to enable/disable default reading. In case it is set to false only attribute set by user are returned ignoring undefined.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
