                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              plain-text

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Are the credentials within the properties file stored in plain text. If not the credential is expected to be the hex encoded Digest hash of 'username : realm : password'.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              relative-to

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The name of another previously named path, or of one of the standard paths provided by the system. If 'relative-to' is provided, the value of the 'path' attribute is treated as relative to the path specified by this attribute.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Removes a configuration to use a list users stored within a properties file as the user repository.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Adds a configuration to use a list users stored within a properties file as the user repository.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • path: The path of the properties file containing the users.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • plain-text: Are the credentials within the properties file stored in plain text. If not the credential is expected to be the hex encoded Digest hash of 'username : realm : password'.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • relative-to: The name of another previously named path, or of one of the standard paths provided by the system. If 'relative-to' is provided, the value of the 'path' attribute is treated as relative to the path specified by this attribute.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              users

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Configuration to use a list users stored directly within the standalone.xml or host.xml configuration file as the user repository.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Removes a configuration to use a list users stored directly within the standalone.xml or host.xml configuration file as the user repository.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Adds a configuration to use a list users stored directly within the standalone.xml or host.xml configuration file as the user repository.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              user

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              An authorized user.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              *

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              An authorized user.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              password

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The user's password.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Removes an authorized user.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Adds an authorized user.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • password: The user's password.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              server-identity

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Configuration of the identities that represent the server.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              ssl

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Configuration of the SSL identity of a server or host controller.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              protocol

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The protocol to use when creating the SSLContext.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              keystore-relative-to

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The name of another previously named path, or of one of the standard paths provided by the system. If 'relative-to' is provided, the value of the 'path' attribute is treated as relative to the path specified by this attribute.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              alias

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The alias of the entry to use from the keystore.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              key-password

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The password to obtain the key from the keystore.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              keystore-password

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The password to open the keystore.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              keystore-path

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The path of the keystore.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Removes the SSL identity of a server or host controller.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Adds the SSL identity of a server or host controller.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • protocol: The protocol to use when creating the SSLContext.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • keystore-relative-to: The name of another previously named path, or of one of the standard paths provided by the system. If 'relative-to' is provided, the value of the 'path' attribute is treated as relative to the path specified by this attribute.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • alias: The alias of the entry to use from the keystore.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • key-password: The password to obtain the key from the keystore.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • keystore-password: The password to open the keystore.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • keystore-path: The path of the keystore.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              secret

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Configuration of the secret/password-based identity of a server or host controller.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              value

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The secret / password - Base64 Encoded.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Removes a Adds a secret/password-based identity for a server or host controller.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Adds a secret/password-based identity for a server or host controller.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • value: The secret / password - Base64 Encoded.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              authorization

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Configuration server side for loading additional user information such as roles to be used for subsequent authorization checks.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Configuration to use properties file to load a users roles. The entries within the properties file are username={roles} where roles is a comma separated list of users roles.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              path

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The path of the properties file containing the users roles.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              relative-to

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The name of another previously named path, or of one of the standard paths provided by the system. If 'relative-to' is provided, the value of the 'path' attribute is treated as relative to the path specified by this attribute.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Removes a configuration to use a properties file to load a users roles.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Adds a configuration to use a properties file to load a users roles.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • path: The path of the properties file containing the users roles.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • relative-to: The name of another previously named path, or of one of the standard paths provided by the system. If 'relative-to' is provided, the value of the 'path' attribute is treated as relative to the path specified by this attribute.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              plug-in

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Configuration of a user store plug-in for use by the realm.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              name

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The short name of the plug-in (as registered) to use.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Configuration of a user store plug-in for use by the realm.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Add the plug-in definition.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • name: The short name of the plug-in (as registered) to use.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              property

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              A configuration property to be made available to the plug-in.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              *

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              A property within a security realm resource.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              value

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The optional value of the property.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Remove the property definition.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Add a property definition.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
