                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              default-interface

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Name of an interface that should be used as the interface for any sockets that do not explicitly declare one.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              name

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The name of the socket binding group.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Removes a socket binding group.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Adds a socket binding group.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • port-offset: Increment to apply to the base port values defined in the socket bindings to derive the runtime values to use on this server.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • default-interface: Name of an interface that should be used as the interface for any sockets that do not explicitly declare one.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              socket-binding

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Configuration information for a socket.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              *

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Configuration information for a socket.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              port

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Number of the port to which the socket should be bound.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              bound-port

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The port to which the actual socket using this socket binding configuration has been bound, or undefined if no socket has been bound.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              interface

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Name of the interface to which the socket should be bound, or, for multicast sockets, the interface on which it should listen. This should be one of the declared interfaces.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              fixed-port

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Whether the port value should remain fixed even if numeric offsets are applied to the other sockets in the socket group.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              client-mappings

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Specifies zero or more client mappings for this socket binding. A client connecting to this socket should use the destination address specified in the mapping that matches its desired outbound interface. This allows for advanced network topologies that use either network address translation, or have bindings on multiple network interfaces to function. Each mapping should be evaluated in declared order, with the first successful match used to determine the destination.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LIST of values
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              multicast-port

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Port on which the socket should receive multicast traffic. Must be configured if 'multicast-address' is configured.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              bound-address

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The address to which the actual socket using this socket binding configuration has been bound, or undefined if no socket has been bound.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              name

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The name of the socket. Services which need to access the socket configuration information will find it using this name.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              multicast-address

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Multicast address on which the socket should receive multicast traffic. If unspecified, the socket will not be configured to receive multicast.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              bound

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Whether an actual socket using this socket binding configuration has been bound.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Removes a socket binding configuration from the group.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Adds a socket binding configuration to the group.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • port: Number of the port to which the socket should be bound.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • interface: Name of the interface to which the socket should be bound, or, for multicast sockets, the interface on which it should listen. This should be one of the declared interfaces.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • fixed-port: Whether the port value should remain fixed even if numeric offsets are applied to the other sockets in the socket group.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • client-mappings: Specifies zero or more client mappings for this socket binding. A client connecting to this socket should use the destination address specified in the mapping that matches its desired outbound interface. This allows for advanced network topologies that use either network address translation, or have bindings on multiple network interfaces to function. Each mapping should be evaluated in declared order, with the first successful match used to determine the destination.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • LIST
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • multicast-port: Port on which the socket should receive multicast traffic. Must be configured if 'multicast-address' is configured.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • multicast-address: Multicast address on which the socket should receive multicast traffic. If unspecified, the socket will not be configured to receive multicast.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remote-destination-outbound-socket-binding

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Configuration information for a, remote destination, outbound socket binding.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              *

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Configuration information for a, remote destination, outbound socket binding.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              port

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The port number of the remote destination to which the outbound socket should connect.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              host

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The host name or the IP address of the remote destination to which this outbound socket will connect.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              source-interface

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The name of the interface which will be used for the source address of the outbound socket.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              source-port

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The port number which will be used as the source port of the outbound socket.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              fixed-source-port

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Whether the port value should remain fixed even if numeric offsets are applied to the other outbound sockets in the socket group.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Removes a remote destination outbound socket binding, from a socket binding group

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Adds a remote destination outbound socket binding, to a socket binding group

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • port: The port number of the remote destination to which the outbound socket should connect.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • host: The host name or the IP address of the remote destination to which this outbound socket will connect.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • source-interface: The name of the interface which will be used for the source address of the outbound socket.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • source-port: The port number which will be used as the source port of the outbound socket.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • fixed-source-port: Whether the port value should remain fixed even if numeric offsets are applied to the other outbound sockets in the socket group.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              local-destination-outbound-socket-binding

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Configuration information for a, local destination, outbound socket binding.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              *

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Configuration information for a, local destination, outbound socket binding.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              source-port

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The port number which will be used as the source port of the outbound socket.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              source-interface

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The name of the interface which will be used for the source address of the outbound socket.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              fixed-source-port

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Whether the port value should remain fixed even if numeric offsets are applied to the other outbound sockets in the socket group.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              socket-binding-ref

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The name of the local socket-binding which will be used to determine the port to which this outbound socket connects.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Removes a local destination outbound socket binding, from a socket binding group

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Adds a local destination outbound socket binding, to a socket binding group

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • source-port: The port number which will be used as the source port of the outbound socket.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • source-interface: The name of the interface which will be used for the source address of the outbound socket.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • fixed-source-port: Whether the port value should remain fixed even if numeric offsets are applied to the other outbound sockets in the socket group.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • socket-binding-ref: The name of the local socket-binding which will be used to determine the port to which this outbound socket connects.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
