                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              collection-load-count

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Number of collections loaded.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              collection-fetch-count

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Number of collections fetched.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              collection-update-count

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Number of collections updated.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              collection-remove-count

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Number of collections removed.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              collection-recreated-count

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Number of collections recreated.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              successful-transaction-count

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Number of successful transactions.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              completed-transaction-count

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Number of completed transactions.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              prepared-statement-count

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Number of acquired prepared statements.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              close-statement-count

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Number of released prepared statements.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              optimistic-failure-count

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Number of optimistic lock exceptions.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              enabled

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Determine if statistics are enabled.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              summary

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Log the statistics.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              clear

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Clear statistics.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              evict-all

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Evict all entities from second level cache.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              entity-cache

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Statistics for a Hibernate Second Level Cache region.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              *

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Statistics for a Hibernate Second Level Cache region.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              miss-count

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Number of cacheable entities/collections not found in the cache and loaded.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              put-count

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Number of cacheable entities/collections put in the cache.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              element-count-in-memory

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Number of cacheable entities/collections currently stored in memory.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              hit-count

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Number of cacheable entities/collections successfully retrieved from the cache.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              query-cache

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Statistics for individual queries.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              *

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Statistics for individual queries.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              query-execution-count

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Get number of times query has been executed.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              query-execution-max-time

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Get the time in milliseconds of the query.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              query-execution-min-time

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Get the minimum time in milliseconds of the query.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              query-name

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Query name.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              query-execution-average-time

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Get the average time in milliseconds of the query.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              query-cache-miss-count

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Get the number of times query was not found in cache.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              query-execution-row-count

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Get number of rows returned from executions of query.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              query-cache-hit-count

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Get the number of times query was retrieved from cache.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              query-cache-put-count

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Get the number of times query was put in cache.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              entity

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Statistics for individual entities.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              *

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Statistics for individual entities.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              entity-load-count

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Get number of entity loads.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              entity-update-count

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Get number of entity updates.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              optimistic-failure-count

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Number of optimistic lock exceptions.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              entity-fetch-count

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Get number of entity fetches.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              entity-insert-count

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Get number of entity inserts.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              entity-delete-count

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Get number of entity deletes.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              collection

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Statistics for individual collections.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              *

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Statistics for individual collections.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              collection-fetch-count

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Number of times collection was fetched.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              collection-recreated-count

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Number of times collection was recreated.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              collection-load-count

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Number of times collection was loaded.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              collection-update-count

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Number of times collection was updated.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              collection-remove-count

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Number of times collection was removed.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              ejb3

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Runtime resources exposed by EJBs components included in this deployment.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              message-driven-bean

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Message driven bean component included in the deployment.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              *

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Message driven bean component included in the deployment.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes
