                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              timers

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              EJB timers associated with the component.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LIST of values
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              pool-available-count

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The number of available (i.e. not in use) instances in the pool.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              peak-concurrent-invocations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Peak concurrent invocations.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              invocations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Number of invocations processed.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              pool-create-count

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The number of bean instances that have been created.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              declared-roles

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The roles declared (via @DeclareRoles) on this EJB component.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LIST of STRING values
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              security-domain

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The security domain for this EJB component.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              pool-name

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The name of the pool.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              run-as-role

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The run-as role (if any) for this EJB component.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              component-class-name

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The component's class name.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              pool-max-size

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The maximum size of the pool.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              wait-time

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Time spend waiting to obtain an instance.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              execution-time

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Time spend within a bean method.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              pool-remove-count

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The number of bean instances that have been removed.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              pool-current-size

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The current size of the pool.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              singleton-bean

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Singleton bean component included in the deployment.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              *

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Singleton bean component included in the deployment.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              declared-roles

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The roles declared (via @DeclareRoles) on this EJB component.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LIST of STRING values
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              timers

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              EJB timers associated with the component.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LIST of values
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              security-domain

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The security domain for this EJB component.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              peak-concurrent-invocations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Peak concurrent invocations.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              run-as-role

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The run-as role (if any) for this EJB component.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              component-class-name

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The component's class name.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              invocations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Stateless session bean component included in the deployment.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              *

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Stateless session bean component included in the deployment.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              timers

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              EJB timers associated with the component.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LIST of values
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              pool-available-count

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The number of available (i.e. not in use) instances in the pool.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LIST of STRING values
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              subdeployment

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Runtime resources associated with a child deployment packaged inside another deployment; for example a war packaged inside an ear.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              *

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Runtime resources associated with a child deployment packaged inside another deployment; for example a war packaged inside an ear.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              subsystem

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Runtime resources created when the deployment is deployed, organized by the subsystem responsible for the runtime resource.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              web

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Runtime resources exposed by web components in the deployment.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              expired-sessions

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Number of sessions that have expired

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              rejected-sessions

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Number of rejected sessions

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              max-active-sessions

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Max number of concurrent active sessions

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              session-max-alive-time

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The longest time (in seconds) that an expired session had been alive

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              sessions-created

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Total sessions created

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              session-avg-alive-time

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Average time (in seconds) that expired sessions had been alive

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              context-root

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The context root of the web application

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              virtual-host

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The name of the virtual host on which the web application is served

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              active-sessions

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Number of active sessions

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              duplicated-session-ids

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Number of duplicated session IDs generated by the random source (anything bigger than 0 means problems)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              servlet

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Runtime information about the servlets in the deployment.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              *

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Runtime information about the servlets in the deployment.
