                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • allowed: on, off

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              use-imr

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Indicates whether the implementation repository should be used (on) or not (off).

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • allowed: on, off

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              name

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The name of the running ORB.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              max-threads

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The maximum number of active request processor threads. Threads are first obtained from the pool and once the pool is exhausted new threads are created until the number of threads reaches this limit. New requests will wait until an active thread finishes its job.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              use-bom

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Indicates whether GIOP 1.2 byte order markers should be used (on) or not (off).

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • allowed: on, off

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              cache-typecodes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Indicates whether typecodes should be cached (on) or not (off).

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • allowed: on, off

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              indirection-encoding-disable

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Indicates whether indirection encoding for repeated typecodes should be disabled (on) or not (off).

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • allowed: on, off

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              queue-min

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The size of the queue for notifying waiting requests. In other words, blocked requests are only notified when the queue has no more than queue-min requests.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              retry-interval

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The interval in milliseconds between retries.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              outbuf-cache-timeout

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The buffer cache timeout in milliseconds.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              outbuf-size

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The size of the network buffers for outgoing messages.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              security-domain

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The name of the security domain that holds the key and trust stores that will be used to establish SSL connections.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              retries

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The number of retries if connections cannot be promptly established.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              export-corbaloc

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Indicates whether the root context should be exported as corbaloc::address:port/NameService (on) or not (off).

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • allowed: on, off

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Removes the JacORB subsystem.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Adds the JacORB subsystem.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • transactions: Indicates whether the transactions interceptors are to be installed (on or spec) or not (off). The value 'on' enabled JTS while 'spec' enables a spec compliant mode (non JTS) that rejects incoming transaction contexts.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • support-ssl: Indicates whether SSL is to be supported (on) or not (off).
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • socket-binding: The name of the socket binding configuration that specifies the ORB port.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • pool-size: The size of the request processors thread-pool. Threads that finish processing a request are placed back in the pool if the pool is not full and discarded otherwise.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • cache-poa-names: Indicates whether POA names should be cached (on) or not (off).
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • add-component-via-interceptor: Indicates whether SSL components should be added by an IOR interceptor (on) or not (off).
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • max-managed-buf-size: The log2 of maximum size managed by the internal buffer manager.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • client-timeout: The client-side connection timeout value in milliseconds. A value of zero indicates that the connection never times out.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • server-supports: Value that indicates the server SSL supported parameters (None, ServerAuth, ClientAuth, MutualAuth).
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • queue-wait: Indicates whether requests that exceed the maximum queue size should wait (on) or not (off). When disabled, a TRANSIENT exception is thrown if the queue is full.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • giop-minor-version: The GIOP minor version to be used.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • monitoring: Indicates whether the monitoring GUI should be displayed (on) or not (off).
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • server-requires: Value that indicates the server SSL required parameters (None, ServerAuth, ClientAuth, MutualAuth).
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • client-supports: Value that indicates the client SSL supported parameters (None, ServerAuth, ClientAuth, MutualAuth).
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • properties: A list of generic key/value properties.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • OBJECT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • root-context: The naming service root context.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • comet: Indicates whether interoperability with Comet's ORB is enabled (on) or not (off).
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • ssl-socket-binding: The name of the socket binding configuration that specifies the ORB SSL port.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • client-requires: Value that indicates the client SSL required parameters (None, ServerAuth, ClientAuth, MutualAuth).
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • max-server-connections: The maximum number of connections accepted by the server.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • iona: Indicates whether interoperability with IONA's ASP is enabled (on) or not (off).
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • chunk-custom-rmi-valuetypes: Indicates whether custom RMI valuetypes should be encoded as chunks (on) or not (off).
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • queue-max: The maximum number of requests that can be queued.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • print-version: Indicates whether the version number should be printed during ORB startup (on) or not (off).
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • server-timeout: The server-side connection timeout value in milliseconds. A value of zero indicates that the connection never times out.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • security: Indicates whether the security interceptors are to be installed (on) or not (off).
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • sun: Indicates whether interoperability with Sun's ORB is enabled (on) or not (off).
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • lax-boolean-encoding: Indicates whether any non-zero CDR encoded boolean value should be interpreted as true (on) or not (off).
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • strict-check-on-tc-creation: Indicates whether the method create_abstract_interface_tc should perform a validation check on the name parameter (on) or not (off).
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • use-imr: Indicates whether the implementation repository should be used (on) or not (off).
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • name: The name of the running ORB.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • max-threads: The maximum number of active request processor threads. Threads are first obtained from the pool and once the pool is exhausted new threads are created until the number of threads reaches this limit. New requests will wait until an active thread finishes its job.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • use-bom: Indicates whether GIOP 1.2 byte order markers should be used (on) or not (off).
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • cache-typecodes: Indicates whether typecodes should be cached (on) or not (off).
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • indirection-encoding-disable: Indicates whether indirection encoding for repeated typecodes should be disabled (on) or not (off).
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • queue-min: The size of the queue for notifying waiting requests. In other words, blocked requests are only notified when the queue has no more than queue-min requests.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • retry-interval: The interval in milliseconds between retries.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • outbuf-cache-timeout: The buffer cache timeout in milliseconds.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • outbuf-size: The size of the network buffers for outgoing messages.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • security-domain: The name of the security domain that holds the key and trust stores that will be used to establish SSL connections.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • retries: The number of retries if connections cannot be promptly established.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • export-corbaloc: Indicates whether the root context should be exported as corbaloc::address:port/NameService (on) or not (off).
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              jaxr

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The configuration of the JAXR subsystem.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              jndi-name

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The JNDI name under which the JAXR ConnectionFactory is bound

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              class

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The JAXR ConnectionFactory implementation class

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Removes the JAXR subsystem.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Adds the JAXR subsystem.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • jndi-name: The JNDI name under which the JAXR ConnectionFactory is bound
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • class: The JAXR ConnectionFactory implementation class
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              property

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              A JAXR property. The identity of the resource defines the property name.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              *

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              A JAXR property. The identity of the resource defines the property name.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              value

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The JAXR property value.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Remove a JAXR property

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
