                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              largest-thread-count

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The largest number of threads that have ever simultaneously been in the pool.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              keepalive-time

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Used to specify the amount of time that pool threads should be kept running when idle; if not specified, threads will run until the executor is shut down.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:OBJECT of values
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              thread-factory

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Specifies the name of a specific thread factory to use to create worker threads. If not defined an appropriate default thread factory will be used.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              queue-length

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The queue length.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              handoff-executor

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              An executor to delegate tasks to in the event that a task cannot be accepted. If not specified, tasks that cannot be accepted will be silently discarded.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              max-threads

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The maximum thread pool size.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              name

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The name of the thread pool.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              rejected-count

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The number of tasks that have been passed to the handoff-executor (if one is specified) or discarded.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              allow-core-timeout

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Whether core threads may time out.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Removes a bounded queue thread pool.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Adds a bounded queue thread pool.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • core-threads: The core thread pool size which is smaller than the maximum pool size. If undefined, the core thread pool size is the same as the maximum thread pool size.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • keepalive-time: Used to specify the amount of time that pool threads should be kept running when idle; if not specified, threads will run until the executor is shut down.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • OBJECT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • thread-factory: Specifies the name of a specific thread factory to use to create worker threads. If not defined an appropriate default thread factory will be used.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • queue-length: The queue length.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • handoff-executor: An executor to delegate tasks to in the event that a task cannot be accepted. If not specified, tasks that cannot be accepted will be silently discarded.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • max-threads: The maximum thread pool size.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • name: The name of the thread pool.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • allow-core-timeout: Whether core threads may time out.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              short-running-threads

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              boolean indicating if service for short running activated

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              *

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              A thread pool executor with a bounded queue where threads submittings tasks will not block. Such a thread pool has a core and maximum size and a specified queue length. When a task is submitted, if the number of running threads is less than the core size, a new thread is created. Otherwise, if there is room in the queue, the task is enqueued. Otherwise, if the number of running threads is less than the maximum size, a new thread is created. Otherwise, the task is handed off to the designated handoff executor, if one is specified. Otherwise, the task is discarded.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              core-threads

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The core thread pool size which is smaller than the maximum pool size. If undefined, the core thread pool size is the same as the maximum thread pool size.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              current-thread-count

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The current number of threads in the pool.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              largest-thread-count

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The largest number of threads that have ever simultaneously been in the pool.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              keepalive-time

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Used to specify the amount of time that pool threads should be kept running when idle; if not specified, threads will run until the executor is shut down.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:OBJECT of values
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              thread-factory

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Specifies the name of a specific thread factory to use to create worker threads. If not defined an appropriate default thread factory will be used.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              queue-length

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The queue length.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              handoff-executor

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              An executor to delegate tasks to in the event that a task cannot be accepted. If not specified, tasks that cannot be accepted will be silently discarded.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              max-threads

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The maximum thread pool size.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              name

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The name of the thread pool.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              rejected-count

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The number of tasks that have been passed to the handoff-executor (if one is specified) or discarded.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              allow-core-timeout

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Whether core threads may time out.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Removes a bounded queue thread pool.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Adds a bounded queue thread pool.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • core-threads: The core thread pool size which is smaller than the maximum pool size. If undefined, the core thread pool size is the same as the maximum thread pool size.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • keepalive-time: Used to specify the amount of time that pool threads should be kept running when idle; if not specified, threads will run until the executor is shut down.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • OBJECT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • thread-factory: Specifies the name of a specific thread factory to use to create worker threads. If not defined an appropriate default thread factory will be used.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • queue-length: The queue length.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • handoff-executor: An executor to delegate tasks to in the event that a task cannot be accepted. If not specified, tasks that cannot be accepted will be silently discarded.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • max-threads: The maximum thread pool size.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • name: The name of the thread pool.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • allow-core-timeout: Whether core threads may time out.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              cached-connection-manager

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Cached connection manager for resource adapters

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              cached-connection-manager

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              jca.cached-connection-manager

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              debug

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Enable/disable debug information logging

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              error

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Enable/disable error information logging

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              install

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Enable/disable the cached connection manager valve and interceptor

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Remove cached connection manager functionality

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Add cached connection manager functionality

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • debug: Enable/disable debug information logging
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • error: Enable/disable error information logging
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • install: Enable/disable the cached connection manager valve and interceptor
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              threads

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The threading subsystem, used to declare manageable thread pools and resources.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Removes the threading subsystem.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Adds the threading subsystem.
