                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • worker-task-keepalive: The number of milliseconds to keep non-core remoting worker task threads alive.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              outbound-connection

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Remoting outbound connections.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              *

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Remoting outbound connection.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              uri

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The connection URI for the outbound connection.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Removes a generic URI based remoting outbound connection.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Adds a generic URI based remoting outbound connection.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • uri: The connection URI for the outbound connection.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              property

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The XNIO Options that will be used during the connection creation.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              *

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Properties supported by the underlying provider. The property name is inferred from the last element of the properties address.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              value

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The property value.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Removes a property.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Adds a property.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • value: The property value.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remote-outbound-connection

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Remoting outbound connections for remote:// URI scheme.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              *

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Remoting outbound connection with a implicit remote:// URI scheme.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              outbound-socket-binding-ref

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Name of the outbound-socket-binding which will be used to determine the destination address and port for the connection.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              username

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The user name to use when authenticating against the remote server.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              security-realm

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Reference to the security realm to use to obtain the password and SSL configuration.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Removes a remote:// URI scheme based outbound connection.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Adds a remote:// URI scheme based outbound connection.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • outbound-socket-binding-ref: Name of the outbound-socket-binding which will be used to determine the destination address and port for the connection.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • username: The user name to use when authenticating against the remote server.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • security-realm: Reference to the security realm to use to obtain the password and SSL configuration.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              property

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The XNIO Options that will be used during the connection creation.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              *

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Properties supported by the underlying provider. The property name is inferred from the last element of the properties address.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              value

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The property value.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Removes a property.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Adds a property.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • value: The property value.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              connector

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The remoting connectors.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              *

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The configuration of a Remoting connector.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              authentication-provider

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The "authentication-provider" element contains the name of the authentication provider to use for incoming connections.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              socket-binding

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The name (or names) of the socket binding(s) to attach to.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              security-realm

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The associated security realm to use for authentication for this connector.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Removes a remoting connector.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Adds a Remoting connector.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • authentication-provider: The "authentication-provider" element contains the name of the authentication provider to use for incoming connections.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • socket-binding: The name (or names) of the socket binding(s) to attach to.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • security-realm: The associated security realm to use for authentication for this connector.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              security

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Configuration of security for this connector.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              sasl

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The "sasl" element contains the SASL authentication configuration for this connector.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              qop

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The optional nested "qop" element contains a list of quality-of-protection values, in decreasing order of preference.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LIST of STRING values
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              include-mechanisms

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The optional nested "include-mechanisms" element contains a whitelist of allowed SASL mechanism names. No mechanisms will be allowed which are not present in this list.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LIST of STRING values
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              strength

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The optional nested "strength" element contains a list of cipher strength values, in decreasing order of preference.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LIST of STRING values
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              server-auth

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The optional nested "server-auth" boolean element specifies whether the server should authenticate to the client. Not all mechanisms may support this setting.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              reuse-session

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The optional nested "reuse-session" boolean element specifies whether or not the server should attempt to reuse previously authenticated session information. The mechanism may or may not support such reuse, and other factors may also prevent it.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Removes the SASL authentication configuration for its connector

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Adds the SASL authentication configuration for its connector

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • qop: The optional nested "qop" element contains a list of quality-of-protection values, in decreasing order of preference.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • LIST
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • include-mechanisms: The optional nested "include-mechanisms" element contains a whitelist of allowed SASL mechanism names. No mechanisms will be allowed which are not present in this list.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • LIST
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • strength: The optional nested "strength" element contains a list of cipher strength values, in decreasing order of preference.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • LIST
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • server-auth: The optional nested "server-auth" boolean element specifies whether the server should authenticate to the client. Not all mechanisms may support this setting.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • reuse-session: The optional nested "reuse-session" boolean element specifies whether or not the server should attempt to reuse previously authenticated session information. The mechanism may or may not support such reuse, and other factors may also prevent it.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              sasl-policy

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Specifies an optional policy to use to narrow down the available set of mechanisms.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              policy

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The policy configuration.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              forward-secrecy

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The optional nested "forward-secrecy" element contains a boolean value which specifies whether mechanisms that implement forward secrecy between sessions are required. Forward secrecy means that breaking into one session will not automatically provide information for breaking into future sessions.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              no-plain-text

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The optional nested "no-plain-text" element contains a boolean value which specifies whether mechanisms susceptible to simple plain passive attacks (e.g., "PLAIN") are not permitted. "false" to permit, "true" to deny.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
