                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              In ASYNC mode, this attribute can be used to trigger flushing of the queue when it reaches a specific threshold.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              queue-flush-interval

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              In ASYNC mode, this attribute controls how often the asynchronous thread used to flush the replication queue runs. This should be a positive integer which represents thread wakeup time in milliseconds.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remote-timeout

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              In SYNC mode, the timeout (in ms) used to wait for an acknowledgment when making a remote call, after which the call is aborted and an exception is thrown.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              owners

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Number of cluster-wide replicas for each cache entry.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              virtual-nodes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Controls the number of virtual nodes per "real" node. If numVirtualNodes is 1, then virtual nodes are disabled. The topology aware consistent hash must be used if you wish to take advantage of virtual nodes. A default of 1 is used.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              l1-lifespan

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Maximum lifespan of an entry placed in the L1 cache. This element configures the L1 cache behavior in 'distributed' caches instances. In any other cache modes, this element is ignored.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Remove a cache from this container.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Add a distributed cache to this cache container

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • start: The cache start mode, which can be EAGER (immediate start) or LAZY (on-demand start).
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • batching: If enabled, the invocation batching API will be made available for this cache.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • indexing: If enabled, entries will be indexed when they are added to the cache. Indexes will be updated as entries change or are removed.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • jndi-name: The jndi-name to which to bind this cache instance.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • module: The module whose class loader should be used when building this cache's configuration.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • indexing-properties: Properties to control indexing behaviour
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • OBJECT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • async-marshalling: If enabled, this will cause marshalling of entries to be performed asynchronously.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • mode: Sets the clustered cache mode, ASYNC for asynchronous operation, or SYNC for synchronous operation.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • queue-size: In ASYNC mode, this attribute can be used to trigger flushing of the queue when it reaches a specific threshold.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • queue-flush-interval: In ASYNC mode, this attribute controls how often the asynchronous thread used to flush the replication queue runs. This should be a positive integer which represents thread wakeup time in milliseconds.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • remote-timeout: In SYNC mode, the timeout (in ms) used to wait for an acknowledgment when making a remote call, after which the call is aborted and an exception is thrown.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • owners: Number of cluster-wide replicas for each cache entry.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • virtual-nodes: Controls the number of virtual nodes per "real" node. If numVirtualNodes is 1, then virtual nodes are disabled. The topology aware consistent hash must be used if you wish to take advantage of virtual nodes. A default of 1 is used.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • l1-lifespan: Maximum lifespan of an entry placed in the L1 cache. This element configures the L1 cache behavior in 'distributed' caches instances. In any other cache modes, this element is ignored.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • state-transfer: The state transfer configuration for distribution and replicated caches.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • OBJECT

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              locking

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The locking configuration of the cache.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              LOCKING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The locking configuration of the cache.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              isolation

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Sets the cache locking isolation level.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • allowed: NONE, SERIALIZABLE, REPEATABLE_READ, READ_COMMITTED, READ_UNCOMMITTED

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              striping

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              If true, a pool of shared locks is maintained for all entries that need to be locked. Otherwise, a lock is created per entry in the cache. Lock striping helps control memory footprint but may reduce concurrency in the system.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              acquire-timeout

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Maximum time to attempt a particular lock acquisition.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              concurrency-level

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Concurrency level for lock containers. Adjust this value according to the number of concurrent threads interacting with Infinispan.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Removes a locking configuration element from the cache.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Adds a locking configuration element to the cache.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • isolation: Sets the cache locking isolation level.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • striping: If true, a pool of shared locks is maintained for all entries that need to be locked. Otherwise, a lock is created per entry in the cache. Lock striping helps control memory footprint but may reduce concurrency in the system.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • acquire-timeout: Maximum time to attempt a particular lock acquisition.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • concurrency-level: Concurrency level for lock containers. Adjust this value according to the number of concurrent threads interacting with Infinispan.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              transaction

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The cache transaction configuration.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              TRANSACTION

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The cache transaction configuration.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              mode

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Sets the cache transaction mode to one of NONE, NON_XA, NON_DURABLE_XA, FULL_XA.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • allowed: NONE, NON_XA, NON_DURABLE_XA, FULL_XA

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              stop-timeout

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              If there are any ongoing transactions when a cache is stopped, Infinispan waits for ongoing remote and local transactions to finish. The amount of time to wait for is defined by the cache stop timeout.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              locking

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The locking mode for this cache, one of OPTIMISTIC or PESSIMISTIC.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • allowed: OPTIMISTIC, PESSIMISTIC

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Removes a transaction configuration element from the cache.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Adds a transaction configuration element to the cache.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • mode: Sets the cache transaction mode to one of NONE, NON_XA, NON_DURABLE_XA, FULL_XA.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • stop-timeout: If there are any ongoing transactions when a cache is stopped, Infinispan waits for ongoing remote and local transactions to finish. The amount of time to wait for is defined by the cache stop timeout.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • locking: The locking mode for this cache, one of OPTIMISTIC or PESSIMISTIC.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              eviction

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The cache eviction configuration.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              EVICTION

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The cache eviction configuration.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              strategy

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Sets the cache eviction strategy. Available options are 'UNORDERED', 'FIFO', 'LRU', 'LIRS' and 'NONE' (to disable eviction).

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • allowed: NONE, UNORDERED, FIFO, LRU, LIRS

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              max-entries

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Maximum number of entries in a cache instance. If selected value is not a power of two the actual value will default to the least power of two larger than selected value. -1 means no limit.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Removes an eviction configuration element from the cache.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Adds an eviction configuration element to the cache.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • strategy: Sets the cache eviction strategy. Available options are 'UNORDERED', 'FIFO', 'LRU', 'LIRS' and 'NONE' (to disable eviction).
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • max-entries: Maximum number of entries in a cache instance. If selected value is not a power of two the actual value will default to the least power of two larger than selected value. -1 means no limit.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              expiration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The cache expiration configuration.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              EXPIRATION

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The cache expiration configuration.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              max-idle

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Maximum idle time a cache entry will be maintained in the cache, in milliseconds. If the idle time is exceeded, the entry will be expired cluster-wide. -1 means the entries never expire.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              lifespan

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Maximum lifespan of a cache entry, after which the entry is expired cluster-wide, in milliseconds. -1 means the entries never expire.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              interval

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Interval (in milliseconds) between subsequent runs to purge expired entries from memory and any cache stores. If you wish to disable the periodic eviction process altogether, set wakeupInterval to -1.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Removes an expiration configuration element from the cache.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns
