                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Adds a EJB remote channel creation option

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • value: The value for the EJB remote channel creation option
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type: The type of the channel creation option
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              timer-service

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The EJB timer service

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              path

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The directory to store persistent timer information in

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              thread-pool-name

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The name of the thread pool used to run timer service invocations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              relative-to

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The relative path that is used to resolve the timer data store location

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Removes the timer service

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Adds the timer service

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • path: The directory to store persistent timer information in
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • thread-pool-name: The name of the thread pool used to run timer service invocations
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • relative-to: The relative path that is used to resolve the timer data store location
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              thread-pool

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              An EJB thread pool

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              *

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              A thread pool executor with an unbounded queue. Such a thread pool has a core size and a queue with no upper bound. When a task is submitted, if the number of running threads is less than the core size, a new thread is created. Otherwise, the task is placed in queue. If too many tasks are allowed to be submitted to this type of executor, an out of memory condition may occur.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              active-count

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The approximate number of threads that are actively executing tasks.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              current-thread-count

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The current number of threads in the pool.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              task-count

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The approximate total number of tasks that have ever been scheduled for execution.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              largest-thread-count

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The largest number of threads that have ever simultaneously been in the pool.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              keepalive-time

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Used to specify the amount of time that pool threads should be kept running when idle; if not specified, threads will run until the executor is shut down.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:OBJECT of values
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              thread-factory

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Specifies the name of a specific thread factory to use to create worker threads. If not defined an appropriate default thread factory will be used.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              completed-task-count

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The approximate total number of tasks that have completed execution.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              max-threads

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The maximum thread pool size.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              name

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The name of the thread pool.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              rejected-count

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The number of tasks that have been rejected.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Removes an unbounded thread pool.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Adds an unbounded thread pool.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • keepalive-time: Used to specify the amount of time that pool threads should be kept running when idle; if not specified, threads will run until the executor is shut down.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • OBJECT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • thread-factory: Specifies the name of a specific thread factory to use to create worker threads. If not defined an appropriate default thread factory will be used.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • max-threads: The maximum thread pool size.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • name: The name of the thread pool.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              file-passivation-store

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              A file system based passivation store

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              *

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              A file system based passivation store

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              idle-timeout

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The timeout in units specified by idle-timeout-unit, after which a bean will passivate

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              groups-path

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              sessions-path

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              relative-to

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              subdirectory-count

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              max-size

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The maximum number of beans this cache should store before forcing old beans to passivate

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              idle-timeout-unit

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The unit of idle-timeout

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • allowed: NANOSECONDS, MICROSECONDS, MILLISECONDS, SECONDS, MINUTES, HOURS, DAYS

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Removes a file system based passivation store

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Adds a file system based passivation store

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • idle-timeout: The timeout in units specified by idle-timeout-unit, after which a bean will passivate
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • groups-path:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • sessions-path:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • relative-to:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • subdirectory-count:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • max-size: The maximum number of beans this cache should store before forcing old beans to passivate
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • idle-timeout-unit: The unit of idle-timeout
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              strict-max-bean-instance-pool

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              A bean instance pool with a strict upper limit

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              *

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              A bean instance pool with a strict upper limit

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              timeout-unit

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The instance acquisition timeout unit

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • allowed: NANOSECONDS, MICROSECONDS, MILLISECONDS, SECONDS, MINUTES, HOURS, DAYS

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              max-pool-size

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The maximum number of bean instances that the pool can hold at a given point in time

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              timeout

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The maximum amount of time to wait for a bean instance to be available from the pool

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Removes a specific a bean instance pool which has a strict upper limit for bean instances

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Adds a bean instance pool which has a strict upper limit for bean instances
