                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Used to specify if the recovery system should listen on a network socket or not.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              number-of-application-rollbacks

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The number of transactions that have been rolled back by application request. This includes those that timeout, since the timeout behavior is considered an attribute of the application configuration.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              status-socket-binding

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Used to reference the correct socket binding to use for the transaction status manager.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              node-identifier

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Used to set the node identifier on the core environment.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 0

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              enable-tsm-status

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Whether the transaction status manager (TSM) service, needed for out of process recovery, should be provided or not..

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              object-store-relative-to

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              References a global path configuration in the domain model, defaulting to the JBoss Application Server data directory (jboss.server.data.dir). The value of the "path" attribute will treated as relative to this path. Use an empty string to disable the default behavior and force the value of the "path" attribute to be treated as an absolute path.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              enable-statistics

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Whether statistics should be enabled.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              number-of-resource-rollbacks

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The number of transactions that rolled back due to resource (participant) failure.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Removes the transaction subsystem

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Adds the transaction subsystem

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • relative-to: References a global path configuration in the domain model, defaulting to the JBoss Application Server data directory (jboss.server.data.dir). The value of the "path" attribute will treated as relative to this path. Use an empty string to disable the default behavior and force the value of the "path" attribute to be treated as an absolute path.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • process-id-uuid: Indicates whether the transaction manager should use a UUID based process id.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • socket-binding: Used to reference the correct socket binding to use for the recovery environment.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • jts: If true this enables the Java Transaction Service
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • object-store-path: Denotes a relative or absolute filesystem path denoting where the transaction manager object store should store data. By default the value is treated as relative to the path denoted by the "relative-to" attribute.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • path: Denotes a relative or absolute filesystem path denoting where the transaction manager core should store data. By default the value is treated as relative to the path denoted by the "relative-to" attribute.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • process-id-socket-binding: The name of the socket binding configuration to use if the transaction manager should use a socket-based process id. Will be 'undefined' if 'process-id-uuid' is 'true'; otherwise must be set.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • default-timeout: The default timeout.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • process-id-socket-max-ports: The maximum number of ports to search for an open port if the transaction manager should use a socket-based process id. If the port specified by the socket binding referenced in 'process-id-socket-binding' is occupied, the next higher port will be tried until an open port is found or the number of ports specified by this attribute have been tried. Will be 'undefined' if 'process-id-uuid' is 'true'.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • use-hornetq-store: Use the HornetQ journal store for writing transaction logs. Set to true to enable and to false to use the default log store type. The default log store is normally one file system file per transaction log. The server should be restarted for this setting to take effect.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • recovery-listener: Used to specify if the recovery system should listen on a network socket or not.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • status-socket-binding: Used to reference the correct socket binding to use for the transaction status manager.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • node-identifier: Used to set the node identifier on the core environment.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • enable-tsm-status: Whether the transaction status manager (TSM) service, needed for out of process recovery, should be provided or not..
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • object-store-relative-to: References a global path configuration in the domain model, defaulting to the JBoss Application Server data directory (jboss.server.data.dir). The value of the "path" attribute will treated as relative to this path. Use an empty string to disable the default behavior and force the value of the "path" attribute to be treated as an absolute path.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • enable-statistics: Whether statistics should be enabled.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              log-store

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Representation of the transaction logging storage mechanism.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              log-store

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Representation of the transaction logging storage mechanism.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              type

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Specifies the implementation type of the logging store.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Remove a representation of the transaction logging storage mechanism.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Add a representation of the transaction logging storage mechanism.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type: Specifies the implementation type of the logging store.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              probe

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Scan for new transaction logs. This operation will creates a child for each pending transaction.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              transactions

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The persistent information that the transaction manager stores for the purpose of recovering a transaction in the event of failure. The probe operation will add and remove transactions from the model as the corresponding real transactions start and finish the prepare and commit phases. A stuck transaction will remain in the model until either it is completed or explicitly removed by the delete operation.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              *

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The persistent information that the transaction manager stores for the purpose of recovering a transaction in the event of failure. The probe operation will add and remove transactions from the model as the corresponding real transactions start and finish the prepare and commit phases. A stuck transaction will remain in the model until either it is completed or explicitly removed by the delete operation.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              id

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The id of this transaction.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              jmx-name

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The JMX name of this transaction.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 0

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              type

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The type name under which this record is stored.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              age-in-seconds

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The time since this transaction was prepared or when the recovery system last tried to recover it.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              delete

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Remove this transaction log. WARNING after this operation the transaction manager will have no knowledge of the transaction and will therefore never be able to recover it. If you are sure that the transaction is complete then the operation is safe. The representation of the transaction log is removed from the model too.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              participants

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The resources that did work in a transaction.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              *

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The resources that did work in a transaction.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              jmx-name

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The JMX name of this participant.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 0

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              eis-product-name

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The JCA enterprise information system's product name.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 0

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              status

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Reports the commitment status of this participant (can be one of Pending, Prepared, Failed, Heuristic or Readonly).

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • allowed: PENDING, PREPARED, FAILED, HEURISTIC, READONLY

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              eis-product-version

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The JCA enterprise information system's product version

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 0

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              jndi-name

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              JNDI name of this participant.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              type

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The type name under which this record is stored.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              refresh

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Refresh the management view of the attributes of this participant record by querying the transaction log. (Note that the read-resource operaton only reads the model, hence the need for this refresh operation).

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              recover

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              If this record is in a heuristic state then attempt to replay the commit phase of the 2PC transaction.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              datasources

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The data-sources subsystem, used to declare JDBC data-sources

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              installed-drivers

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              List of JDBC drivers that have been installed in the runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LIST of values
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
