                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              root-logger-unassign-handler

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Unassign a Handler from the root logger.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • name: The handler's name.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              change-root-log-level

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Change the root logger level.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • level: The log level specifying which message levels will be logged by this logger. Message levels lower than this value will be discarded.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              set-root-logger

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Set the root logger.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • level: The log level specifying which message levels will be logged by this. Message levels lower than this value will be discarded.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • filter: Defines a simple filter type.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • OBJECT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • handlers: The Handlers associated with this Logger.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • LIST

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              root-logger-assign-handler

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Assign a Handler to the root logger.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • name: The handler's name.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Set the root logger.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • level: The log level specifying which message levels will be logged by this. Message levels lower than this value will be discarded.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • filter: Defines a simple filter type.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • OBJECT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • handlers: The Handlers associated with this Logger.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • LIST

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              logger

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Defines a logger category.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              *

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Defines a logger category.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              level

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The log level specifying which message levels will be logged by this. Message levels lower than this value will be discarded.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • allowed: ALL, FINEST, FINER, TRACE, DEBUG, FINE, CONFIG, INFO, WARN, WARNING, ERROR, FATAL, OFF

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              filter

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Defines a simple filter type.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:OBJECT of values
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • allowed: all, any, accept, change-level, deny, level, level-range, match, not, replace

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              handlers

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The Handlers associated with this Logger.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LIST of values
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              use-parent-handlers

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Specifies whether or not this logger should send its output to it's parent Logger.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              assign-handler

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Assign a Handler to a Logger.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • name: The handler's name.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Remove an existing logger category.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              change-log-level

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Change the logging level for a logger category.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • level: The log level specifying which message levels will be logged by this logger. Message levels lower than this value will be discarded.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Add a new logger category.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • level: The log level specifying which message levels will be logged by this. Message levels lower than this value will be discarded.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • filter: Defines a simple filter type.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • OBJECT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • handlers: The Handlers associated with this Logger.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • LIST
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • use-parent-handlers: Specifies whether or not this logger should send its output to it's parent Logger.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • category: Specifies the category for the logger.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              unassign-handler

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Unassign a Handler from a Logger.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • name: The handler's name.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              async-handler

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Defines a handler which writes to the sub-handlers in an asynchronous thread. Used for handlers which introduce a substantial amount of lag.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              *

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Defines a handler which writes to the sub-handlers in an asynchronous thread. Used for handlers which introduce a substantial amount of lag.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              level

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The log level specifying which message levels will be logged by this. Message levels lower than this value will be discarded.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • allowed: ALL, FINEST, FINER, TRACE, DEBUG, FINE, CONFIG, INFO, WARN, WARNING, ERROR, FATAL, OFF

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              filter

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Defines a simple filter type.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:OBJECT of values
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • allowed: all, any, accept, change-level, deny, level, level-range, match, not, replace

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              formatter

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Defines a formatter.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              queue-length

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The queue length to use before flushing writing

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              overflow-action

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Specify what action to take when the overflowing. The valid options are 'block' and 'discard'

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • allowed: BLOCK, DISCARD

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              subhandlers

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The Handlers associated with this async handler.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LIST of values
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              encoding

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The character encoding used by this Handler.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              unassign-subhandler

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Unassign a subhandler from the ASYNC handler.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • name: The handler's name.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Remove an existing logging handler.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              update-properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Update the properties of an existing ASYNC handler.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • name: The handler's name.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • level: The log level specifying which message levels will be logged by this. Message levels lower than this value will be discarded.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • filter: Defines a simple filter type.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • OBJECT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • formatter: Defines a formatter.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • queue-length: The queue length to use before flushing writing
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • overflow-action: Specify what action to take when the overflowing. The valid options are 'block' and 'discard'
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • subhandlers: The Handlers associated with this async handler.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • LIST

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              enable

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Enable a logging handler.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              disable

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Disable a logging handler.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              change-log-level

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Change the logging level for a handler.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • level: The log level specifying which message levels will be logged by this logger. Message levels lower than this value will be discarded.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              assign-subhandler

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Assign a subhandler to the ASYNC handler.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • name: The handler's name.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Add a new ASYNC handler.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • name: The handler's name.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • level: The log level specifying which message levels will be logged by this. Message levels lower than this value will be discarded.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • filter: Defines a simple filter type.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • OBJECT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • formatter: Defines a formatter.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • queue-length: The queue length to use before flushing writing
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • overflow-action: Specify what action to take when the overflowing. The valid options are 'block' and 'discard'
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • subhandlers: The Handlers associated with this async handler.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • LIST

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              console-handler

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Defines a handler which writes to the console.
