                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              module

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The name of AS7 module containing the resources required to lookup source and target JMS resources.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              source-context

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              he properties used to configure the source JNDI initial context.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:OBJECT of STRING values
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              paused

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Whether the JMS bridge is paused.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              source-connection-factory

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The name of the source connection factory to lookup on the source messaging server.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add-messageID-in-header

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              If true, then the original message's message ID will be appended in the message sent to the destination in the header HORNETQ_BRIDGE_MSG_ID_LIST. If the message is bridged more than once, each message ID will be appended.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              source-user

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The name of the user for creating the source connection.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              target-user

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The name of the user for creating the target connection.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              subscription-name

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The name of the subscription if it is durable and the source destination is a topic.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              max-batch-time

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The maximum number of milliseconds to wait before sending a batch to target, even if the number of messages consumed has not reached max-batch-size. Its value must be -1 to represent 'wait forever', or >= 1 to specify an actual time.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              started

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Whether the JMS bridge is started.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              target-context

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The properties used to configure the target JNDI initial context.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:OBJECT of STRING values
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              pause

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Pause the JMS bridge.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              stop

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Stop the JMS bridge.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              resume

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Resume the JMS bridge.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Remove an existing JMS bridge.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              start

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Start the JMS bridge.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Add a new JMS bridge.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • selector: A JMS selector expression used for consuming messages from the source destination. Only messages that match the selector expression will be bridged from the source to the target destination.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • failure-retry-interval: The amount of time in milliseconds to wait between trying to recreate connections to the source or target servers when the bridge has detected they have failed.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • source-destination: The name of the source destination to lookup on the source messaging server.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • quality-of-service: The desired quality of service mode (AT_MOST_ONCE, DUPLICATES_OK or ONCE_AND_ONLY_ONCE).
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • target-password: The password for creating the target connection.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • max-batch-size: The maximum number of messages to consume from the source destination before sending them in a batch to the target destination. Its value must >= 1.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • max-retries: The number of times to attempt to recreate connections to the source or target servers when the bridge has detected they have failed. The bridge will give up after trying this number of times. -1 represents 'try forever'.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • client-id: The JMS client ID to use when creating/looking up the subscription if it is durable and the source destination is a topic.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • source-password: The password for creating the source connection.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • target-connection-factory: The name of the target connection factory to lookup on the target messaging server.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • target-destination: The name of the target destination to lookup on the target messaging server.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • module: The name of AS7 module containing the resources required to lookup source and target JMS resources.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • source-context: he properties used to configure the source JNDI initial context.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • OBJECT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • source-connection-factory: The name of the source connection factory to lookup on the source messaging server.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • add-messageID-in-header: If true, then the original message's message ID will be appended in the message sent to the destination in the header HORNETQ_BRIDGE_MSG_ID_LIST. If the message is bridged more than once, each message ID will be appended.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • source-user: The name of the user for creating the source connection.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • target-user: The name of the user for creating the target connection.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • subscription-name: The name of the subscription if it is durable and the source destination is a topic.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • max-batch-time: The maximum number of milliseconds to wait before sending a batch to target, even if the number of messages consumed has not reached max-batch-size. Its value must be -1 to represent 'wait forever', or >= 1 to specify an actual time.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • target-context: The properties used to configure the target JNDI initial context.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • OBJECT

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              hornetq-server

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              A HornetQ server instance.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              *

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              A HornetQ server instance.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              shared-store

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Whether this server is using a shared store for failover.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              thread-pool-max-size

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The number of threads that the main thread pool has. -1 means no limit.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              clustered

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Whether the server is clustered.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remoting-interceptors

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The list of interceptor classes used by this server.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LIST of STRING values
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              create-bindings-dir

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Whether the server should create the bindings directory on start up.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              journal-buffer-size

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The size of the internal buffer on the journal.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              security-invalidation-interval

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              How long (in ms) to wait before invalidating the security cache.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              message-counter-enabled

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Whether message counters are enabled.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              journal-type

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The type of journal to use.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • allowed: NIO, ASYNCIO

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              journal-sync-transactional

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Whether to wait for transaction data to be synchronized to the journal before returning a response to the client.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              journal-compact-min-files

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The minimal number of journal data files before we can start compacting.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              log-journal-write-rate

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Whether to periodically log the journal's write rate and flush rate.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              journal-max-io

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The maximum number of write requests that can be in the AIO queue at any one time.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              scheduled-thread-pool-max-size
