                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              max-delivery-attempts

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Defines how many time a cancelled message can be redelivered before sending to the dead-letter-address

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              max-size-bytes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The max bytes size.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              message-counter-history-day-limit

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Day limit for the message counter history.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              expiry-address

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Defines where to send a message that has expired.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              redelivery-delay

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Defines how long to wait before attempting redelivery of a cancelled message

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              redistribution-delay

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Defines how long to wait when the last consumer is closed on a queue before redistributing any messages

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              page-max-cache-size

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The number of page files to keep in memory to optimize IO during paging navigation.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              page-size-bytes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The paging size.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              send-to-dla-on-no-route

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              If this parameter is set to true for that address, if the message is not routed to any queues it will instead be sent to the dead letter address (DLA) for that address, if it exists.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operation removing an existing address-setting

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operation adding an address-setting

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • address-full-policy: Determines what happens when an address where max-size-bytes is specified becomes full. (PAGE, DROP or BLOCK)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • dead-letter-address: The dead letter address
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • last-value-queue: Defines whether a queue only uses last values or not
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • max-delivery-attempts: Defines how many time a cancelled message can be redelivered before sending to the dead-letter-address
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • max-size-bytes: The max bytes size.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • message-counter-history-day-limit: Day limit for the message counter history.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • expiry-address: Defines where to send a message that has expired.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • redelivery-delay: Defines how long to wait before attempting redelivery of a cancelled message
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • redistribution-delay: Defines how long to wait when the last consumer is closed on a queue before redistributing any messages
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • page-max-cache-size: The number of page files to keep in memory to optimize IO during paging navigation.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • page-size-bytes: The paging size.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • send-to-dla-on-no-route: If this parameter is set to true for that address, if the message is not routed to any queues it will instead be sent to the dead letter address (DLA) for that address, if it exists.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              grouping-handler

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Makes decisions about which node in a cluster should handle a message with a group id assigned.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              *

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Makes decisions about which node in a cluster should handle a message with a group id assigned.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              type

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Whether the handler is the single "Local" handler for the cluster, which makes handling decisions, or a "Remote" handler which converses with the local handler.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              grouping-handler-address

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              A reference to a cluster connection and the address it uses.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              timeout

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              How long to wait for a handling decision to be made; an exception will be thrown during the send if this timeout is reached, ensuring that strict ordering is kept.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operation removing the grouping handler.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operation adding the grouping handler. Only one grouping handler is allowed.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type: Whether the handler is the single "Local" handler for the cluster, which makes handling decisions, or a "Remote" handler which converses with the local handler.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • grouping-handler-address: A reference to a cluster connection and the address it uses.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • timeout: How long to wait for a handling decision to be made; an exception will be thrown during the send if this timeout is reached, ensuring that strict ordering is kept.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              acceptor

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              An acceptor defines a way in which connections can be made to the HornetQ server.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              *

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              An acceptor defines a way in which connections can be made to the HornetQ server.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              factory-class

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The factory class.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              socket-binding

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The socket binding reference.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              started

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Whether this acceptor is started.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              stop

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Stops the acceptor.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operation adding an acceptor

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              start

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Starts the acceptor.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operation adding an acceptor

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • factory-class: The factory class.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • socket-binding: The socket binding reference.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • param: A set of key-value pairs understood by the acceptor factory-class and used to configure it.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • OBJECT

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              param

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              A key-value pair understood by the acceptor factory-class and used to configure it.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              *

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              A parameter

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              value

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The parameter value

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operation removing an existing parameter

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operation adding a new parameter

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • value: The parameter value
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              jms-topic

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Defines a JMS topic.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              *

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Defines a JMS topic.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              entries

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The jndi names the topic will be bound to.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LIST of STRING values
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              topic-address

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The address the topic points to.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              temporary

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Whether the topic is temporary.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              message-count

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The number of messages currently in this queue.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              delivering-count

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The number of messages that this queue is currently delivering to its consumers.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
