                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              scheduled-thread-pool-max-size

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The scheduled thread pool max size.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              thread-pool-max-size

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The thread pool max size.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              transaction-batch-size

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The transaction batch size.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              use-auto-recovery

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              True to use auto recovery.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              use-global-pools

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              True to use global pools.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              use-jndi

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Use JNDI to locate the destination for incoming connections

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              user

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The default username to use with this connection factory. This is only needed when pointing the connection factory to a remote host.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              jndi-params

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The JNDI params to use for locating the destination for incoming connections.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              use-local-tx

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Use a local transaction for incoming sessions

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              setup-attempts

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The number of times to set up an MDB endpoint

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              setup-interval

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The interval between attempts at setting up an MDB endpoint.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              transaction

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              TODO

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              min-pool-size

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The minimum size for the pool

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              max-pool-size

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The maximum size for the pool

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Removes managed a connection factory.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Adds a managed connection factory.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • connector: Defines the connectors. These are stored in a map by connector name (with an undefined value).
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • OBJECT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • entries: The jndi names the connection factory should be bound to.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • LIST
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • auto-group: The autogroup.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • block-on-acknowledge: True to set block on acknowledge.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • block-on-durable-send: True to set block on durable send.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • block-on-non-durable-send: True to set block on non durable send.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • cache-large-message-client: True to cache large messages.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • call-timeout: The call time out.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • client-failure-check-period: The client failure check period.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • client-id: The client id.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • confirmation-window-size: The confirmation window size.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • connection-ttl: The connection ttl.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • consumer-max-rate: The consumer max rate.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • consumer-window-size: The consumer window size.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • discovery-group-name: The discovery group name.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • discovery-initial-wait-timeout: The discovery initial wait time out.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • dups-ok-batch-size: The dups ok batch size.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • failover-on-initial-connection: True to fail over on initial connection.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • failover-on-server-shutdown: True to fail over on server shutdown.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • group-id: The group id.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • ha: Whether the connection factory supports High Availability.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • connection-load-balancing-policy-class-name: Name of a class implementing a client-side load balancing policy that a client can use to load balance sessions across different nodes in a cluster.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • max-retry-interval: The max retry interval.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-large-message-size: The min large message size.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • password: The default password to use with this connection factory. This is only needed when pointing the connection factory to a remote host.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • pre-acknowledge: True to pre-acknowledge.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • producer-max-rate: The producer max rate.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • producer-window-size: The producer window size.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • reconnect-attempts: The reconnect attempts.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • retry-interval: The retry interval.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • retry-interval-multiplier: The retry interval multiplier.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BIG_DECIMAL
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • scheduled-thread-pool-max-size: The scheduled thread pool max size.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • thread-pool-max-size: The thread pool max size.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • transaction-batch-size: The transaction batch size.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • use-auto-recovery: True to use auto recovery.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • use-global-pools: True to use global pools.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • use-jndi: Use JNDI to locate the destination for incoming connections
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • user: The default username to use with this connection factory. This is only needed when pointing the connection factory to a remote host.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • jndi-params: The JNDI params to use for locating the destination for incoming connections.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • use-local-tx: Use a local transaction for incoming sessions
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • setup-attempts: The number of times to set up an MDB endpoint
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • setup-interval: The interval between attempts at setting up an MDB endpoint.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • transaction: TODO
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-pool-size: The minimum size for the pool
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • max-pool-size: The maximum size for the pool
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              connector

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              A connector can be used by a client to define how it connects to a server.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              *

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              A connector can be used by a client to define how it connects to a server.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              factory-class

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The factory class.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              socket-binding

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The socket binding reference.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operation removing a connector

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operation adding a connector

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • factory-class: The factory class.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • socket-binding: The socket binding reference.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • param: A set of key-value pairs understood by the connector factory-class and used to configure it.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • OBJECT

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              param

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              A key-value pair understood by the connector factory-class and used to configure it.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              *

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              A parameter

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              value

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The parameter value

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operation removing an existing parameter
