                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              max-retry-interval

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The max retry interval.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              min-large-message-size

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The min large message size.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              pre-acknowledge

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              True to pre-acknowledge.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              producer-max-rate

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The producer max rate.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              producer-window-size

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The producer window size.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              reconnect-attempts

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The reconnect attempts.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              retry-interval

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The retry interval.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              retry-interval-multiplier

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The retry interval multiplier.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BIG_DECIMAL
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              scheduled-thread-pool-max-size

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The scheduled thread pool max size.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              thread-pool-max-size

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The thread pool max size.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              transaction-batch-size

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The transaction batch size.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              use-global-pools

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              True to use global pools.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              factory-type

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The type of connection factory.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • allowed: GENERIC, QUEUE, TOPIC, XA_GENERIC, XA_QUEUE, XA_TOPIC

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              initial-message-packet-size

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The initial size of messages created through this factory.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Removes a connection factory.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add-jndi

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Adds the factory to another JNDI binding

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • jndi-binding: The name of the binding for JNDI
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Adds a connection factory.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • connector: Defines the connectors. These are stored in a map by connector name (with an undefined value).
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • OBJECT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • entries: The jndi names the connection factory should be bound to.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • LIST
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • auto-group: Whether or not message grouping is automatically used
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • block-on-acknowledge: True to set block on acknowledge.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • block-on-durable-send: True to set block on durable send.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • block-on-non-durable-send: True to set block on non durable send.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • cache-large-message-client: True to cache large messages.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • call-timeout: The call time out.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • client-failure-check-period: The client failure check period.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • client-id: The client id.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • compress-large-messages: Whether large messages should be compressed.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • confirmation-window-size: The confirmation window size.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • connection-ttl: The connection ttl.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • consumer-max-rate: The consumer max rate.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • consumer-window-size: The consumer window size.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • discovery-group-name: The discovery group name.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • discovery-initial-wait-timeout: The discovery initial wait time out.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • dups-ok-batch-size: The dups ok batch size.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • failover-on-initial-connection: True to fail over on initial connection.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • failover-on-server-shutdown: True to fail over on server shutdown.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • group-id: The group id.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • ha: Whether the connection factory supports High Availability.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • connection-load-balancing-policy-class-name: Name of a class implementing a client-side load balancing policy that a client can use to load balance sessions across different nodes in a cluster.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • max-retry-interval: The max retry interval.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-large-message-size: The min large message size.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • pre-acknowledge: True to pre-acknowledge.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • producer-max-rate: The producer max rate.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • producer-window-size: The producer window size.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • reconnect-attempts: The reconnect attempts.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • retry-interval: The retry interval.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • retry-interval-multiplier: The retry interval multiplier.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BIG_DECIMAL
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • scheduled-thread-pool-max-size: The scheduled thread pool max size.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • thread-pool-max-size: The thread pool max size.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • transaction-batch-size: The transaction batch size.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • use-global-pools: True to use global pools.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • factory-type: The type of connection factory.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              broadcast-group

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              A broadcast group is the means by which a server broadcasts connectors over the network.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              *

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              A broadcast group is the means by which a server broadcasts connectors over the network.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              connectors

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Specifies the names of connectors that will be broadcast.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LIST of STRING values
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              group-address

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The multicast address to which the data will be broadcast. It is a class D IP address in the range 224.0.0.0 to 239.255.255.255, inclusive. The address 224.0.0.0 is reserved and is not available for use.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              group-port

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The UDP port number used for broadcasting.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              local-bind-address

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The local bind address that the datagram socket is bound to. If you have multiple network interfaces on your server, you would specify which one you wish to use for broadcasts by setting this attribute. If this attribute is not specified then the socket will be bound to the wildcard address, an IP address chosen by the kernel.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              started

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Whether the broadcast group is started.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              local-bind-port

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The local port to which the datagram socket is bound. Normally you would just use the default value of -1 which signifies that an anonymous port should be used. This parameter is always specified in conjunction with local-bind-address.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              socket-binding

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The broadcast group socket binding.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              broadcast-period

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The period in milliseconds between consecutive broadcasts.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              get-connector-pairs-as-json

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns the pairs of live-backup connectors that are broadcasted by this broadcast group using JSON serialization.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:
