                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              discovery-group

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Multicast group to listen to receive broadcast from other servers announcing their connectors.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              *

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Multicast group to listen to receive broadcast from other servers announcing their connectors.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              refresh-timeout

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Period the discovery group waits after receiving the last broadcast from a particular server before removing that server's connector pair entry from its list.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              group-address

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Multicast IP address of the group to listen on.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              group-port

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              UDP port of the multicast group.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              local-bind-address

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The local bind address that the datagram socket is bound to.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              socket-binding

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The discovery group socket binding.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              initial-wait-timeout

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Period, in ms, to wait for an initial broadcast to give us at least one node in the cluster.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Remove a discovery group.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Add a discovery group.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • refresh-timeout: Period the discovery group waits after receiving the last broadcast from a particular server before removing that server's connector pair entry from its list.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • group-address: Multicast IP address of the group to listen on.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • group-port: UDP port of the multicast group.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • local-bind-address: The local bind address that the datagram socket is bound to.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • socket-binding: The discovery group socket binding.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • initial-wait-timeout: Period, in ms, to wait for an initial broadcast to give us at least one node in the cluster.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • LONG

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              connector-service

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              TODO

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              *

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              TODO

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              factory-class

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Class name of the factory class that can instantiate the connector service.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operation removing a connector service

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operation adding a connector service

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • factory-class: Class name of the factory class that can instantiate the connector service.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              param

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              A key/value pair understood by the connector service's factory-class

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              *

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              A key/value pair understood by the connector service's factory-class

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              value

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Value portion of a key/value pair understood by the connector service's factory-class

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Removes a key/value pair understood by the connector service's factory-class

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Adds a key/value pair understood by the connector service's factory-class

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • value: Value portion of a key/value pair understood by the connector service's factory-class
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              pojo

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Support JBoss5 and JBoss6 pojo configuration model.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Remove pojo subsystem

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Add pojo subsystem

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              jpa

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The configuration of the JPA subsystem.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              default-datasource

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The name of the default global datasource.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 0

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Remove the JPA subsystem.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Add the JPA subsystem.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • default-datasource: The name of the default global datasource.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              naming

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The configuration of the naming subsystem.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Removes the naming subsystem.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              jndi-view

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Dump the local JNDI tree

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Adds the naming subsystem.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              binding

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              JNDI bindings for primitive types

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              *

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              JNDI bindings for primitive types

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              module

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The module to load the object factory from for object factory bindings

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              environment

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The environment to use on object factory instance retrieval

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:OBJECT of STRING values
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              binding-type

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The type of binding to create, may be simple, lookup or object-factory

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              value

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The value to bind for simple bindings

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              class

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The object factory class name for object factory bindings

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              type

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The type of the value to bind for simple bindings, this must be a primitive type

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              lookup

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The entry to lookup in JNDI for lookup bindings

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Removes a JNDI binding

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Adds a JNDI binding

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • module: The module to load the object factory from for object factory bindings
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • environment: The environment to use on object factory instance retrieval
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • OBJECT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • binding-type: The type of binding to create, may be simple, lookup or object-factory
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • value: The value to bind for simple bindings
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • class: The object factory class name for object factory bindings
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
