                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              adds mail server

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • outbound-socket-binding-ref: Outbound Socket binding to mail server
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • ssl: Does server require SSL?
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • username: Username to authenticate on server
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • password: Password to authenticate on server
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              web

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The configuration of the jboss.web subsystem.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              default-virtual-server

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The web container's default virtual server.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              instance-id

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Set the identifier for this server instance.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              native

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Add the native initialization listener to the web container.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operation removing the web subsystem.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operation adding the web subsystem.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • default-virtual-server: The web container's default virtual server.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • instance-id: Set the identifier for this server instance.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • native: Add the native initialization listener to the web container.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The common web container configuration.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              container

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Common container configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              mime-mapping

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              A mime-mapping definition.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:OBJECT of STRING values
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              welcome-file

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              A welcome files declaration.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LIST of values
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add-mime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Adds mime type

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • name: A mime-mapping name.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • value: A mime-mapping value.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Removes web container

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove-mime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Remove mime type

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • name: A mime-mapping name.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Adds web container

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • mime-mapping: A mime-mapping definition.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • OBJECT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • welcome-file: A welcome files declaration.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • LIST

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              static-resources

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Static files serving configuration.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              sendfile

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Enable sendfile if possible, for files bigger than the specified byte size.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              max-depth

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Maximum recursion for PROPFIND.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              read-only

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Allow write HTTP methods (PUT, DELETE).

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              webdav

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Enable WebDAV functionality.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              secret

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Secret for WebDAV locking operations.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              file-encoding

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Force a file encoding.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              listings

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Enable folder listings.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              disabled

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Disables the default Servlet mapping.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Remove static configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Add static configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • sendfile: Enable sendfile if possible, for files bigger than the specified byte size.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • max-depth: Maximum recursion for PROPFIND.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • read-only: Allow write HTTP methods (PUT, DELETE).
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • webdav: Enable WebDAV functionality.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • secret: Secret for WebDAV locking operations.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • file-encoding: Force a file encoding.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • listings: Enable folder listings.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • disabled: Disables the default Servlet mapping.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              jsp-configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              JSP container configuration.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              trim-spaces

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Trim some spaces from the generated Servlet.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              source-vm

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Source VM level for compilation.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              development

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Enable the development mode, which gives more information when an error occurs.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              keep-generated

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Keep the generated Servlets.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              recompile-on-fail

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Retry failed JSP compilations on each request.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              check-interval

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Check interval for JSP updates using a background thread.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              modification-test-interval

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Minimum amount of time between two tests for updates, in seconds.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              scratch-dir

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Specify a different work directory.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              display-source-fragment

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              When a runtime error occurs, attempts to display corresponding JSP source fragment.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
