                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              error-on-use-bean-invalid-class-attribute

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Enable errors when using a bad class in useBean.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              java-encoding

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Specify the encoding used for Java sources.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              tag-pooling

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Enable tag pooling.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              generate-strings-as-char-arrays

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Generate String constants as char arrays.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              target-vm

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Target VM level for compilation.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              x-powered-by

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Enable advertising the JSP engine in x-powered-by.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              dump-smap

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Write SMAP data to a file.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              mapped-file

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Map to the JSP source.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              disabled

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Enable the JSP container.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              smap

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Enable SMAP.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Removes JSP container configuration.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Adds JSP container configuration.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • trim-spaces: Trim some spaces from the generated Servlet.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • source-vm: Source VM level for compilation.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • development: Enable the development mode, which gives more information when an error occurs.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • keep-generated: Keep the generated Servlets.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • recompile-on-fail: Retry failed JSP compilations on each request.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • check-interval: Check interval for JSP updates using a background thread.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • modification-test-interval: Minimum amount of time between two tests for updates, in seconds.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • scratch-dir: Specify a different work directory.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • display-source-fragment: When a runtime error occurs, attempts to display corresponding JSP source fragment.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • error-on-use-bean-invalid-class-attribute: Enable errors when using a bad class in useBean.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • java-encoding: Specify the encoding used for Java sources.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • tag-pooling: Enable tag pooling.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • generate-strings-as-char-arrays: Generate String constants as char arrays.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • target-vm: Target VM level for compilation.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • x-powered-by: Enable advertising the JSP engine in x-powered-by.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • dump-smap: Write SMAP data to a file.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • mapped-file: Map to the JSP source.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • disabled: Enable the JSP container.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • smap: Enable SMAP.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              virtual-server

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              A virtual host.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              *

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              A virtual host.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              enable-welcome-root

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Whether or not the bundled welcome directory is used as the root web context.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              default-web-module

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The web module deployment name that will be mapped as the root webapp.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              alias

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The virtual server aliases

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LIST of values
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              name

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              A unique virtual host name

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-only
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Remove an existing virtual-server

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Add a new virtual-server

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • enable-welcome-root: Whether or not the bundled welcome directory is used as the root web context.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • default-web-module: The web module deployment name that will be mapped as the root webapp.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • alias: The virtual server aliases
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • LIST
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • name: A unique virtual host name
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              configuration of virutal server

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              sso

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The SSO configuration for this virtual server.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              domain

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The cookie domain that will be used.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              cache-container

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Enables clustered SSO using the specified clustered cache container.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              reauthenticate

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Enables reauthentication with the realm when using SSO.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              cache-name

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Name of the cache to use in the cache container.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Erase the SSO configuration from the virtual server.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Add a SSO configuration for this virtual server.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • domain: The cookie domain that will be used.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • cache-container: Enables clustered SSO using the specified clustered cache container.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • reauthenticate: Enables reauthentication with the realm when using SSO.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • cache-name: Name of the cache to use in the cache container.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              access-log

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The access log configuration for this virtual server.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              pattern

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The access log pattern.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              rotate

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Rotate the access log every day.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              prefix

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Prefix for the log file name.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
