                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              protocol

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The web connector protocol.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              enable-lookups

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Enable DNS lookups for Servlet API.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              executor

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The name of the executor that should be used for the processing threads of this connector. If undefined defaults to using an internal pool.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              processingTime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Processing time used by the connector. Im milli-seconds.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              redirect-port

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The port for redirection to a secure connector.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              bytesReceived

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Number of byte received by the connector (POST data).

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: metric
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: runtime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              max-connections

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Amount of concurrent connections that can be processed by the connector with optimum performance. The default value depends on the connector used.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              max-save-post-size

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Maximum size in bytes of a POST request that will be saved during certain authentication schemes.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Remove an existing web connector

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Add a new web connector.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • proxy-port: The port that will be used when sending a redirect.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • secure: Indicates if content sent or received by the connector is secured from the user perspective.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • virtual-server: The list of virtual servers that can be accessed through this connector. The default is to allow all virtual servers.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • LIST
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • socket-binding: The web connector socket-binding reference, this connector should be bound to.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • scheme: The web connector scheme.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • name: A unique name for the connector.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • max-post-size: Maximum size in bytes of a POST request that can be parsed by the container.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • proxy-name: The host name that will be used when sending a redirect. The default value is null.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • enabled: Defines whether the connector should be started on startup.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • protocol: The web connector protocol.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • enable-lookups: Enable DNS lookups for Servlet API.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • executor: The name of the executor that should be used for the processing threads of this connector. If undefined defaults to using an internal pool.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • redirect-port: The port for redirection to a secure connector.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • max-connections: Amount of concurrent connections that can be processed by the connector with optimum performance. The default value depends on the connector used.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • max-save-post-size: Maximum size in bytes of a POST request that will be saved during certain authentication schemes.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              ssl

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The SSL configuration of the connector.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Various additional configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              ssl

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The SSL configuration of the connector.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              key-alias

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The key alias.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              verify-depth

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Limit certificate nesting.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              protocol

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The SSL protocols that are enabled.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              cipher-suite

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The allowed cipher suite.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              certificate-file

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Server certificate file.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              ca-certificate-password

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Certificate password.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              ca-certificate-file

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Certificate authority.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              session-cache-size

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              SSL session cache.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              password

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Password.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              session-timeout

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              SSL session cache timeout.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              ca-revocation-url

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Certificate authority revocation list.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              truststore-type

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Type of the truststore, There are various types of keystores available, including "PKCS12" and Sun's "JKS."

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              name

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The configuration name.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              certificate-key-file

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Key file for the certificate.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              verify-client

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Enable client certificate verification.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              keystore-type

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Type of the keystore, There are various types of keystores available, including "PKCS12" and Sun's "JKS."

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Remove the SSL configuration of the connector.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Add an SSL configuration of the connector.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • key-alias: The key alias.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • verify-depth: Limit certificate nesting.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • protocol: The SSL protocols that are enabled.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • cipher-suite: The allowed cipher suite.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • certificate-file: Server certificate file.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • ca-certificate-password: Certificate password.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • ca-certificate-file: Certificate authority.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
