                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • session-cache-size: SSL session cache.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • password: Password.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • session-timeout: SSL session cache timeout.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • INT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • ca-revocation-url: Certificate authority revocation list.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • truststore-type: Type of the truststore, There are various types of keystores available, including "PKCS12" and Sun's "JKS."
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • name: The configuration name.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • certificate-key-file: Key file for the certificate.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • verify-client: Enable client certificate verification.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • keystore-type: Type of the keystore, There are various types of keystores available, including "PKCS12" and Sun's "JKS."
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              cmp

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The configuration of the cmp subsystem.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Removes the cmp subsystem.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Adds the cmp subsystem.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              uuid-keygenerator

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              UUID based key generators

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              *

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              UUID based key generators

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Remove a UUID key generator

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Add a UUID key generator

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              hilo-keygenerator

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              HiLo based key generators

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              *

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              HiLo based key generators

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              block-size

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The block size

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              sequence-name

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The name of the sequence

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              sequence-column

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The sequence column name

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              create-table

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Boolean to determine whether to create create the tables

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              data-source

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The datasource used for sequence generation

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              select-hi-ddl

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The DDL used to select the hi value

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              drop-table

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Boolean to determine whether to create drop the tables

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              create-table-ddl

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The DDL used to create the table

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              id-column

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The ID column name

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              table-name

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The table name

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Remove a HiLo key generator

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Add a HiLo key generator

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • block-size: The block size
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • LONG
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • sequence-name: The name of the sequence
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • sequence-column: The sequence column name
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • create-table: Boolean to determine whether to create create the tables
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • data-source: The datasource used for sequence generation
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • select-hi-ddl: The DDL used to select the hi value
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • drop-table: Boolean to determine whether to create drop the tables
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • create-table-ddl: The DDL used to create the table
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • id-column: The ID column name
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • table-name: The table name
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              jsr77

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The configuration of the JSR-77 subsystem.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Removes the jSR-77 subsystem.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Adds the JSR-77 subsystem.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              resource-adapters

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Configuration of the resource adapters subsystem

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Removes the resource adapters subsystem

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Adds the resource adapters subsystem

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              resource-adapter

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The configuration of a resource adapter

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              *

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              resource-adapter

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              archive

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Specifies the resource adapter archive

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              transaction-support

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Specifies the transaction support level of the resource adapter

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • allowed: NoTransaction, LocalTransaction, XATransaction

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              bootstrap-context

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Specifies the unique name of the bootstrap context that should be used

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              config-properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Custom defined config properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              beanvalidationgroups

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Specifies the bean validation groups that should be used

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LIST of STRING values
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required: false
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              activate

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Force the resource adapter config activation without server reload

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Remove the resource adapter

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Add a new resource adapter

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • archive: Specifies the resource adapter archive
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • transaction-support: Specifies the transaction support level of the resource adapter
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • bootstrap-context: Specifies the unique name of the bootstrap context that should be used
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • config-properties: Custom defined config properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • beanvalidationgroups: Specifies the bean validation groups that should be used
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • LIST

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              connection-definitions

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Specifies the connection definitions

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              *

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              connection-definitions

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              class-name
