                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Removes a JSSE configuration.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Adds a JSSE configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • client-auth: Boolean attribute to indicate if client's certificates should also be authenticated on the server side.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • BOOLEAN
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • protocols: Comma separated list of protocols to enable on SSLSockets.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • truststore: Configures a JSSE trust store
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • OBJECT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • trust-manager: JSEE Trust Manager factory
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • OBJECT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • key-manager: JSEE Key Manager factory
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • OBJECT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • service-auth-token: Token to retrieve PrivateKeys from the KeyStore.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • keystore: Configures a JSSE key store
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • OBJECT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • additional-properties: Additional properties that may be necessary to configure JSSE.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • OBJECT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • server-alias: Preferred alias to use when the KeyManager chooses the server alias.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • client-alias: Preferred alias to use when the KeyManager chooses the client alias.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • cipher-suites: Comma separated list of cipher suites to enable on SSLSockets.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              authorization

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Authorization configuration. Configures a list of authorization policy modules to be used.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              classic

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Authorization configuration. Configures a list of authorization policy modules to be used.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              policy-modules

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              List of authorization modules

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:LIST of values
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Removes an authorization configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Adds an authorization configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • policy-modules: List of authorization modules
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • LIST

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              vault

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Security Vault for attributes.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              classic

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Security Vault for attributes.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Attributes

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              vault-options

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Security Vault options.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:OBJECT of STRING values
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              code

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Fully Qualified Name of the Security Vault Implementation.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • type:STRING
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • required:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • nillable: true
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • access-type: read-write
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • storage: configuration
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • min-length: 1

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Operations

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              remove

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Removes a security vault configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              add

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Adds a security vault configuration

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Request properties
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • vault-options: Security Vault options.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • OBJECT
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • code: Fully Qualified Name of the Security Vault Implementation.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • STRING

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returns

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Returned type:
